programme.title: Happy Halloween

programme.title: BBQ Bowls & Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonio’s best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, & Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austin’s best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin’ beer garden & sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: Smash Burgers & A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: The Jews of Eastern Europe are being massacred by the thousands. Galvanised into action after the death of his wife, Hungarian barrister Sonson finds himself leading an inspirational fight back against the increasingly desperate and dangerous Nazis.

programme.title: Any Bullet Will Do
programme.desc: Two Brothers find themselves on opposing sides of the fight as one hopes to help abolish slavery while the other believes it is his God-given right.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: A married couple find themselves trapped in their frozen vehicle after a blizzard and struggle to survive amid plunging temperatures and unforeseen obstacles.

programme.title: Hospitality
programme.desc: A woman with a checkered past must protect her son when a man brings trouble to her isolated bed and breakfast.

programme.title: Crom
programme.desc: High school teenagers accidentally unleash an ancient Irish entity on their hometown and must stop it before midnight on Halloween.

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: Modeled with Love
programme.desc: When model-maker Olivia's dad is set to retire from their firm, she believes she's the obvious pick to take over. Enter Simon, whose big picture thinking threatens to upend Olivia's comfortable bubble along with her role as successor.

programme.title: Love for Starters
programme.desc: To save her father's lake-front restaurant, a talented interior designer must partner with the celebrity chef her father hired without her knowledge to revamp the place before time runs out.

programme.title: Just for Showmance
programme.desc: Follows Tara Thompson whose presenting career starts to stall, and agrees to go on a TV show to marry her 'perfect match', Joe, a man she's never met. But she secretly tries to track him down to clarify that the marriage is just for show.

programme.title: Rear View Mirror
programme.desc: A young mother tries to escape her abusive, controlling husband and start a new life in an idyllic, peaceful beach town.

programme.title: Killer Queen Bee
programme.desc: Dylan is transferred to a new school after her mom is put in a rehabilitation center for pain pill abuse. After a run in with high school mean girl Tiffany, soon Tiffany is plotting to make Dylan's life a living hell.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E04 - White Death
programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse 7 has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E05 - The Struggle
programme.desc: Laramy remains stuck at Camp Hell Hole, nursing 7's leg, and struggling to survive in the freezing temperatures without food.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E06 - On the Move
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven leave camp Hell Hole and hit the trail again. They are headed for lower elevation in search of a more permanent place to call home.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E07 - Permanent Residence
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven find a long term camping spot out fo the snow and at a lower elevation. Laramy gets to work making a more permanent shelter and looking for food.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E08 - Focused on Food
programme.desc: Laramy locates some whitetail deer and focuses his efforts on hunting them.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E05 - Hunger Pains
programme.desc: Symptoms of starvation have set in for Chris and Casey, who haven’t eaten in days. When they cross paths with a grouse, the unexpected happens. Frustration peaks as the temperatures drop. The brothers set up a new camp, but will it help the hunt?

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E06 - White Out
programme.desc: With still no big game in sight, Chris and Casey are forced to rely on fishing for food. The cold temperatures have slowed down the fish, creating challenges. When Mother Nature brings a brutal snow storm, the brothers are tested likenever before.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E07 - Motherly Love
programme.desc: After weeks of trying to survive in Saskatchewan, Chris and Casey have yet to kill big game. Time is running out as the bear begin to hibernate. Mental willpower is wearing thin. But a message from back home changes everything.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E08 - Refuelled
programme.desc: A turn of events lifts the brothers’ spirits, but creates a huge hurdle they must overcome as they enter a new race against the clock.Chris and Casey reflect on the challenges they have faced so far, and the challenges that still lie ahead.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E09 - The End
programme.desc: In the exciting season finale, Chris lays it all on the line one last time while bear hunting. Casey must finish one final task to make the fruits of their labor worthwhile. As the brothers inch closer to safety, they wonder what the future holds.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S02:E06 - Stranded in the Alaska Wilderness Part 2
programme.desc: After a successful hunt., Adrian Knopps' hunting partner disappears taking their bear out to the boat. Now Adrian finds himself stranded on a tidal flat surround by bears and wolf packs and with massive storm bearing down on him. How will he survive?

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S02:E07 - The Journal
programme.desc: Pastor Mike Turner is on a solo hike across the continental divide in the unforgiving Wind Rivers Range of Wyoming when he becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder. He chronicles his grueling 11-day fight to survive in his own journal.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S02:E08 - Tree Stand Fall
programme.desc: Deer hunter Nathan Holcomb plummets from his tree stand. Every hunters' worst nightmare becomes Nathan's reality. With a broken back and paralyzed, Nathan must crawl out on his own to find help.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S02:E09 - Adrift Part 1
programme.desc: In what is regarded as one of greatest survival stories of the 20th Century, sailor Steven Callahan finds himself alone and adrift in a life raft after his boat, the Napoleon Solo sinks in the mid Atlantic.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S02:E10 - Adrift Part 2
programme.desc: Facing starvation, dehydration and predators from the deep, sailor Steven Callahan fights to survive not only the physical hardships, but also the mental and emotional strain of being adrift and alone in a disintegrating life raft.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E04 - White Death
programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse 7 has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E05 - The Struggle

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E06 - On the Move
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven leave camp Hell Hole and hit the trail again. They are headed for lower elevation in search of a more permanent place to call home.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E07 - Permanent Residence
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven find a long term camping spot out fo the snow and at a lower elevation. Laramy gets to work making a more permanent shelter and looking for food.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E053
programme.desc: La llegada de Jack interrumpe la conversación entre Nicolás y Victoria por un momento, pero la muchacha no duda en ratificarle a Del Casal, frente al actor, que lo ama y necesita saber que él la cree inocente para no perder la esperanza de que algún día puedan volver a amarse. Adelaida asegura a Hansen que sabe lo valioso que es el amor que siente por ella, pero considera que él no se merece un corazón confundido como el suyo sino alguien que corresponda a plenitud su amor; el empresario agradece las palabras de la señora y se marcha luego de asegurar que siente que ha valido la pena vivir por ella.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E62
programme.desc: Ezequiel plantea de forma desinteresada ayudar a Camila a encontrar a su mamá, pero ella expresa que será un trato en que ambos ganarán. Fausto sorprende a Julia con Gregorio en el apartamento de Amelia. Max, desahoga su dolor con Astrid, a quien Camila pidió que lo ayudara a olvidarla.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E63
programme.desc: Fuerte tensión cuando Max encuentra a Camila en la mansión López Méndez. Fausto y Patricia, duros y crueles, agreden a Julia, pero saben que el peor castigo vendrá de manos de su propio padre, Ezequiel.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E82
programme.desc: At the Santa María mansion, Clara Inés orders the workers to take Pastora away. Raul arrives and demands that they leave his mother alone.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E83
programme.desc: At the Santa Maria mansion, Clara argues with an inebriated Raul; therefore, Cristiano informs the couple that the hospice is on fire.

programme.title: Corazón Traicionado - S01:E82
programme.desc: Lorena confesses to Claudio that she is already aware that he is Alberto's real father - Meanwhile, in Alberto's room, he lets Gertrudis know that it is because of her that he is in that bed; because he discovered her plan.

programme.title: Corazón Traicionado - S01:E83
programme.desc: Moved by the great love she feels for Alberto and refusing to see how he would destroy himself by committing a madness, Lorena goes to Omar and his boss to file a complaint against Gertrudis Sotillo de Corona; accusing her of being responsible for the attack on her husband - Virginia, very terrified, is taken to the operating room for the delivery; Elvis takes her hands and reassures her, telling her that they will face this great moment together.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E58
programme.desc: En la habitación, Adriana se enfrenta de nuevo a los deseos inmensos de Cristian de hacerle el amor.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E59
programme.desc: Adriana advierte a Cristian y a Carlos Raúl, que no se peleen por ella, como si fuera una olla del restaurante, exige respeto y decide que no quiere nada con ninguno de los dos.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E052
programme.desc: Clementina se muestra solidaria con Victoria cuando ésta, al saber que Nicolás y Federico regresaron a la ciudad, lamenta que todo entre su amado y ella se haya acabado de manera tan triste. Hilario le confiesa a Florencia que la trata con tanta consideración porque tiene la esperanza de que ella lo llegue a querer como él desea. Fernanda señala a Nicolás y Federico que van a ocultarle a todo el mundo, inclusive a Eugenia y a Antonieta, el verdadero motivo de la muerte de Leopoldo y dirán que fue un accidente de pesca. . La llegada de Jack interrumpe la conversación entre Nicolás y Victoria por un momento, pero la muchacha no duda en ratificarle a Del Casal, frente al actor, que lo ama y necesita saber que él la cree inocente para no perder la esperanza de que algún día puedan volver a amarse.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Mal, Alya, Arif, Nana, Endi and Zizi are ready to take on the new school year! But wait, they’re in for a surprise when their long lost friend, Adam makes a comeback! The gang is complete again! Or so they think. It’s form 4 and the gang is separated into science and arts streams. Best friends, Mal and Adam are separated and have to find a way to get back together. By the end of it, the gang are in for the biggest shock of their lives!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: SMK is closing down! What will the gang do? Worst still, Alya hasn’t been feeling like herself lately. She has trouble focusing and keeps messing up simple tasks. Mal, on the other hand, is going through an identity crisis. He hates football now and really wants to quit, but it’s so hard. By the end of it, they come out stronger. They have a newfound inspiration to save the school!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Before the gang can save the school, they need to figure out why the school is closing down first. Through some snooping around, they find out that the school is being bought over by a snack company to build their factory! The school is in such a bad shape that it became very affordable. The gang know what they must do: Gotong royong to increase the value of the school. While Alya and Adam are serious about saving the school, their friends are goofing off, causing a riff among the group.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Adam has a new plan: To have the whole school’s buy-in to save the school through a petition! To do that, they need to form a committee. However, the group quickly falls apart. Mal discovers that if they continue to pursue the petition, Nana’s sister will lose her job. As their leader, Mal decides to stop their pursuit completely. By the end of it, Adam finally finds out the company taking over the school is his father’s company!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang discovers that Megah Holdings is conducting an interview at school. It’s the perfect opportunity to… sabotage it! Mal, however, is distracted by the gossip social media account, TerLetop, that exposed Cikgu Aini as Mal’s mother! Worse still, Adam didn’t back Mal up as his best friend. During the interview with Megah Holdings, Adam is shocked to find that the person being interviewed is actually his father!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: After another failed plan, the gang turns to Alya for ideas. However, Alya is distracted by a class pop quiz and decides to sit out of saving the school this time. Without Alya, the gang decides it’s better to also focus on their studies first. While Alya thinks this is her time to shine and redeem her old self, her grades still plummet. She then turns to the unthinkable: to cheat in her exam! Consequently, causing her to be stripped off of her prefect position.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Alya navigates through school as a normal student now, while Zizi sets out to find out what is Adam’s relationship with Dato Idris. Meanwhile, Puan Bariah has called Alya’s parents to school due to her recent bad behaviour. Mal ends up consoling Alya, revealing that he lost his father due to the pandemic. Zizi finally finds out that Dato Idris is Adam’s father. By the end of it, while Adam is heading home, he sees that an Upacara Pecah Tanah will commence soon.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang regroup and decide that they will do a public demonstration during the Upacara Pecah Tanah. Zizi, on the other hand, tells Adam to talk to his father about it. TerLetop suddenly posts that there’s a special exposé. Adam accuses Zizi for being the person behind the account. Zizi denies. The Upacara Pecah Tanah carries on as planned. By the end of it, the TerLetop account exposes Zizi as Dato Idris’s daughter. Dato Idris exclaims that actually, Adam is his son instead!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang is disappointed in Adam. He tries to explain himself, to no avail. Adam wants to win his friends back and asks for Zizi’s help. Meanwhile, Cikgu Aini gets into trouble with the school principal because of the public demonstration at the Upacara Pecah Tanah. Mal apologises to Cikgu Aini after he finds out that she was trying to protect him from getting expelled. By the end, Adam discovers the person behind the TerLetop account is Arif!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Dato Idris is finalising the contract in Megah Holdings taking over SMK. Adam finally has the guts to confront his father. However, it’s no use. Arif revives the TerLetop account for one last hurrah. At the school, students, teachers and the public show up in support of SMK. Dato Idris finally caves in and tears the contract. Life in SMK resumes back to normal. Mal finally regains his old identity as a footballer. We also find out that Alya has been secretly gifting Mal cupcakes all along!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Mal, Alya, Arif, Nana, Endi and Zizi are ready to take on the new school year! But wait, they’re in for a surprise when their long lost friend, Adam makes a comeback! The gang is complete again! Or so they think. It’s form 4 and the gang is separated into science and arts streams. Best friends, Mal and Adam are separated and have to find a way to get back together. By the end of it, the gang are in for the biggest shock of their lives!

programme.title: My House And Other Animals
programme.desc: Meet the modern-day Dr Doolittles with a passion for all creatures great and small: the unsung heroes of the wildlife world, whose homes have become havens for every animal imaginable.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Dogs are mans’ most loyal friends. Their well-behaved and cute appearance is very soothing to our hearts. That’s why many people choose dogs to company with their family! There are many choices for companion dogs, but today's cute pet have well-developed muscles and a fierce look on their faces. But in fact, they love to act cute, making the contrast between their personality and appearance is extremely cute!nToday's Cute Pet Coming is going to subvert everyone’s impression on them! Follow us and get to know bulldogs ​​with a fierce face and gentle heart!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt rushes off to answer an urgent call from Flamingoland, where a pregnant rare pygmy goat may need an emergency caesarean. Eight abandoned baby rabbits need some very close attention while back at the zoo there's been trouble at the lemur house. A fight has left one female with a nasty wound but she'd reluctant to receive treatment.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In Birkenhead, Inspector Anthony Joynes is accompanied by the police to attend an unlocked and empty property. Inside he finds Teddy, the terrified Terrier cross that has a flea infestation so bad that he's missing half his fur. One-year-old Teddy is incredibly nervous, but will he be able to overcome his fears and allow the RSPCA to offer him help?

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: The Japanese animated film My Neighbor Totoro, which is popular all over the world is the childhood memory of many. Totoro's classic furry body, round eyes and cute expression are very endearing. In South America, there is a kind of chinchilla that looks very similar to Totoro in the film. I heard that Taiwan now allows legal imports of these animals for breeding! Today, let’s follow the Totoro zoo owner Molly and fall in love with the soft and cute charm of this animation star!

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Kehilangan Arissa telah mengakibatkan semua pihak risau terutama sekali Yaya. Adakah gangguan mental Arissa kembali setelah mengetahui siapa sebenarnye yang mengakibatkan kematian Zariman?

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Setelah Arissa pulang semula ke rumah, Yaya merancang untuk berpindah ke rumah lain dalam usaha untuk menghalang Rafel daripada berjumpa dengan Arissa. Dalam masa yang sama, Diana mengatur langkah untuk menghalang hubungan cinta Arissa dan Rafael dengan bekerjasama dengan Zarina. Rafael nekad untuk menyerah diri kepada polis tapi dihalang Arissa. Sejauh mana perancangan mereka dalam usaha untuk memastikan kematian Zariman terbela.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Arissa sedar bahawa hubungannya dengan Rafael mendapat banyak tentangan. Setelah berdamai dengan Yaya, Arissa dan Rafael bersetuju untuk bekerjasama dengan Zarina dalam kes kematian Zariman. Diana cuba mencari jalan supaya rancangan Arissa tidak berjaya. Yaya menjadi ragu-ragu dengan kesihatan mental Arissa setelah menjumpai satu kertas di dalam bilik Arissa.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Diana cuba menghalang rancangan Arissa daripada membuat pendedahan berhubung kematian kes langgar lari Zariman. Setelah berlaku pergelutan sesama mereka, perjumpaan bersama peguam terpaksa ditangguhkan. Mimi diculik semasa keluar bersama Diana, dalam masa yang sama, Zaki berjaya mengesan Arissa dan cuba memujuk Arissa supaya menyerahkan kembali Mimi kepada keluarganya. Arissa memberi amaran kepada Zaki supaya tidak mendedahkan lokasi persembunyian mereka. Berjayakah Zaki memujuk Arissa atau adakah keselamatan Mimi terjamin dengan adanya Zaki?

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Setelah mendapat bukti Arissa menculik Mimi, Diana dan Rafael ke rumah Arissa dalam usaha untuk mencari beliau tetapi gagal. Yaya, Zarina dan Ajak cuba untuk mengesan dimana lokasi Arissa dan Zaki sebelum polis berjaya menjumpai mereka. Akhirnya Zaki berjaya

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earth's axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk

programme.title: Party Time Favorites
programme.desc: It's time to host a party! Whether it's for the big game or a fancy dinner party, there are so many options you can make your guests or bring to the potluck. So what are you waiting for? It's party time in the Tastemade kitchen!

programme.title: Grill It Up
programme.desc: It's time to Grill. It. Up! From side dishes to main courses, we're going to show you some of our favorite recipes to make using your backyard BBQ. Let's turn up the heat, it's time to get cooking!

programme.title: Plantains and Rice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill celebrates Hispanic Heritage Month with her mom’s recipes as well as some of her own. She’ll whip up a coconut coquito cocktail, Cuban-style black beans, a garlicky arroz con pollo with sofrito, and some salty and sweet plantains.

programme.title: Pizza Slice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill throws a pizza party with her delicious homemade pies! She creates a sweet and savory pie with spicy pepperoni & pineapple, a tangy BBQ chicken pizza, a grandma deep dish pie with mozzarella & chorizo, and an herby salad flatbread.

programme.title: Sweater Weather
programme.desc: The air is crisp and the leaves are changing, which means it’s time to gather ‘round the dinner table for hearty, seasonal meals on a budget. These warm dishes are sure to keep you cozy all season long.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! It’s spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.title: Party Time Favorites
programme.desc: It's time to host a party! Whether it's for the big game or a fancy dinner party, there are so many options you can make your guests or bring to the potluck. So what are you waiting for? It's party time in the Tastemade kitchen!

programme.title: Grill It Up
programme.desc: It's time to Grill. It. Up! From side dishes to main courses, we're going to show you some of our favorite recipes to make using your backyard BBQ. Let's turn up the heat, it's time to get cooking!

programme.title: Plantains and Rice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill celebrates Hispanic Heritage Month with her mom’s recipes as well as some of her own. She’ll whip up a coconut coquito cocktail, Cuban-style black beans, a garlicky arroz con pollo with sofrito, and some salty and sweet plantains.

programme.title: Pizza Slice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill throws a pizza party with her delicious homemade pies! She creates a sweet and savory pie with spicy pepperoni & pineapple, a tangy BBQ chicken pizza, a grandma deep dish pie with mozzarella & chorizo, and an herby salad flatbread.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza van’s mobile oven.

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Spooky Season
programme.desc: The fog is rolling in, which means it's time for the spooky season! But don't you worry, because you'll be able to keep those ghosts and skeletons happy with all the spooky eats and scary treats in this episode of Tastemade's Recipe Rundown!

programme.title: Crock Pots and Steamers
programme.desc: Today, we'll be checking out some incredible recipes that can be made in a crock pot or a steamer! From soups to regular meals, even right down to some unconventional ideas, we've got it all. Plug in those crock pots, it's time to get steamy!

programme.title: Comfort Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, it's time to get cozy with some of our favorite Tastemade comfort food recipes. Get cozy and settle in for what's sure to be a mouth-watering journey!

programme.title: Spring Fling
programme.desc: Spring Fling is here, and we're going to show you some fantastic recipes to enjoy some well deserved time in the sun. What are we waiting for? Let's check it out!

programme.title: Viva La Mexico
programme.desc: Today, we'll be exploring cool cuisines from our neighboor south of the border. From breakfast to traditional fare, all the way to guac and salsa, and ending with dessert. We'll showcase some great dishes and let you know which one is our favorite.

programme.title: Pizza Time
programme.desc: Today we've got pizza all day for you: in the morning, in the evening, literally any time you want! Not only will we share some great recipes but we will let you know which ones are our favorites too. What are we waiting for? Let's get to the pizza!

programme.title: A Trip to Latin America
programme.desc: We hope you brought your passport, because we're heading to Latin America! Whether it's breakfast, lunch, dinner or dessert, we're going to show you some delicious dishes, each with their own unique Latin flair!

programme.title: Cheese!
programme.desc: Today, it's all about cheese: from the melted gooey-ness to just plain old slices, cheese makes the world go round. We'll showcase recipes that feature cheese in all forms. So strap in, it's time to get cheesy.

programme.title: Italian Classics
programme.desc: On this episode, we're going to show you some of our favorite Italian classics. Pasta, pizza, and more... you name it, we've got it. So, what are you waiting for? It's time to get cooking!

programme.title: Southern Home Cooking
programme.desc: Today, we're going on a trip down south for a taste of some country home cooking. Our quest for the best southern dish covers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and of course, dessert. But we better get moving, they're ringing the dinner bell!

programme.title: Jerkin' and GRILLIN'
programme.desc: Back from a trip to Negril, Jamaica, chef Derrell Smith brings his favorite dishes back to his own yard! Grillin’ up Jerk Chicken, Saltfish and Ackee, coconut peas and rice and other Caribbean favorites for his two friends.

programme.title: Happy Birthday to Me
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith’s birthday and he’s treating himself to some self love and a lavish steak dinner inspired by a famous NYC steakhouse. On the menu: Rib Eye Steak with Peppercorn Sauce, Duck Frites, Wedge Salad and a celebratory carrot cake.

programme.title: Brunch Grows Up
programme.desc: Enough with the endless lines and mimosas! Chef Derrell Smith has leveled up his brunch by hosting his own. Today's menu, a "yelluh" grit bowl bar with toppings; Beer Braised Pulled Pork, Chili Fried Eggs, Bang Bang Shrimp and Tajin-rimmed Palomas.

programme.title: Grandma Estelle
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith’s grandma inspired him in life and in the kitchen. He shares family recipes taking him right back to grandma's table. He's cookin' up Fried Chicken, Mac ‘N Cheese, Collard Green Slaw, Brûlée Banana Pudding and Pop-pops moonshine.

programme.title: Farmer's Market Finds
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith heads to the Farmers Market for the first time. Inspired by rows of fresh fruit, veggies and the local farmers he creates a flavorful meal like Veggie Focaccia, Mushroom Medley Pasta, Spiced Apple Cobbler and a crisp white Sangria.

programme.title: A South Carolina Family Reunion
programme.desc: For his reunion inspired menu Chef Derrell Smith is going back to his roots. Cookin’ up some modern takes on the family classics including his Garlic Pesto Potato Salad, Salmon Filet, a Herby, Spicy Kale Slaw, and Grilled Fruit Skewers.

programme.title: Pre-Gaming!
programme.desc: As a former NFL player, game days hit a little different. These days chef Derrell Smith isn’t on the field, he's changing the game in the kitchen with eats like Philly Cheesesteak Taquitos, Oyster Mushroom Wings and Elote Queso with Chili Lime Chips.

programme.title: Dinner Party
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is hosting a dinner party! Living in KoreaTown, Derrell has fallen in love with its food and culture. Tonight, he's servin' up Braised Beef Short Rib with Crispy Rice Cakes, Pickled Cabbage, Glass Noodles Salad and Korean Pancakes.

programme.title: Salad Salad Salad
programme.desc: Amp up your salad game with a little mixing and matching, from light and leafy greens to crisp and hearty toppings, and dressings for all occasions. Frankie shows us how versatile and fulfilling a homemade salad can truly be.

programme.title: How Do You Like Them Apples
programme.desc: Apples aren’t just good for keeping the doctor away. Frankie demonstrates how to make the most of this beloved, everyday fruit, from sweet treats to savory meals. There’s a whole world of apples to dive into, especially while they’re in season.

programme.title: Pantry Pasta
programme.desc: Keep your pantry stocked with a few basic staples, and you’ll always have ingredients on hand for dinner, especially for pasta night. In this episode, Frankie creates delicious pasta dishes with the kitchen’s best-kept secret weapon – the pantry.

programme.title: Bring Your Own Lunch
programme.desc: Frankie is all about BYOL - bring your own lunch. It’s not only good for your wallet, it’s good for your health. Skip the vending machine and the cafeteria in favor of creative, cost effective and easy-to-transport midday meals.

programme.title: Summer BBQ
programme.desc: Summer is coming to a close but there’s still a bounty of fresh, seasonal produce to enjoy. Celebrate with Frankie as he makes some of his favorite cookout classics that’ll take you from a weekend picnic to a backyard BBQ, with or without a grill.

programme.title: The Future is Flavor
programme.desc: Frankie harnesses the power of time to transform simple ingredients into flavorful goods that’ll stick around for a long time. Learn the basics of preserving, pickling & curing to make dinner anything but a struggle. It just takes a little patience.

programme.title: Cabbage, cabbage, cabbage
programme.desc: Cabbage has long been an underrated green on the field, and it’s about time Frankie gives it a starring role. This leafy head proves itself as the versatile ingredient we need it to be, affordable year around, delicious and filling.

programme.title: Crunchy
programme.desc: Reaching textural nirvana is never easy, but Frankie explores several ways to achieve the perfect crunch in his dishes, both savory and sweet. Add this elusive element to your recipes without adding cost to your budget.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Don’t let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankie’s got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! It’s spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Hair-raising Halloween Cakes
programme.desc: Join Mia if you DARE for these Halloween cakes are sure to SCARE! Blood red velvet cake, marshmallow spiderwebs, bubbling caldrons and a cake that bites back will inspire some serious spooky vibes. Mia will seriously impress and teach you new skills

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: After a lightning strike kills the lead singer of a band, she is resurrected with electrifying special abilities.

programme.title: Broken Star
programme.desc: Abandoned by her friends and family and with her career in jeopardy, starlet Markey Marlowe is sequestered in a duplex with a reclusive landlord who just may be more dangerous than she is.

programme.title: Hunting Games
programme.desc: Two dangerous armed men must hunt each other and fight to death over millions of dollars in cash in this high octane wilderness survival story.

programme.title: Johnny & Clyde
programme.desc: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are on an endless crime spree. They decide to assemble a group of criminals and misfits to steal from Alana's casino and pull off the heist of the century.

programme.title: Mojave Diamonds
programme.desc: A former MMA fighter and his brothers must rescue their kidnapped family from a dangerous crime syndicate after $50M of illegal diamonds gets stolen.

programme.title: Broadcast
programme.desc: After a billionaire creates a drug called INOC which stops the aging process, the future of a world where death no longer exists is seen. The story of the fate of mankind is told while also revealing an elusive truth to its unknowing spectator.

programme.title: Pocket Listing
programme.desc: Double crosses, adultery, murder, mistaken identity, and revenge ensue when a mysterious power player and his sultry wife hire a disgraced Los Angeles property broker to discreetly market and sell their Malibu villa.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.

programme.title: Peter Five Eight
programme.desc: Sam, a seemingly poised and glamorous real estate agent in a small mountain community is revealed to be an unhinged and troubled alcoholic with a dark secret, when a charismatic man in a black sedan named Peter shows up in town one day.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - Serena's Game
programme.desc: Refusing to comply with Tommy’s demands, Max and Paul conspire to have the British gangster eliminated and Serena arrested. With Tommy dead and Serena in handcuffs, it appears as though Max has succeeded. His plan goes awry, however, when MI6 force Max to help Serena bring down her employers: the Russian mob. Torn between a life of crime with Serena or happiness with Ava, nothing is ever simple in the life of Max Mayfair.

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page, a brilliant mother-daughter swindler team, target the city's wealthiest men. Max marries them and then sues for alimony after she catches them involved in an affair with Page.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Guns
programme.desc: A deputized gunslinger takes up the call to hunt down the last Cowboy, the chase is on and the bullets fly and only one of these hardened men can survive.

programme.title: The Commando
programme.desc: A DEA agent returns home with PTSD after a botched mission and must now protect his family from a home invasion when a recently freed convict and his henchmen come after their stash of millions hidden inside of the agent's home.

programme.title: Killer Queen Bee
programme.desc: Dylan is transferred to a new school after her mom is put in a rehabilitation center for pain pill abuse. After a run in with high school mean girl Tiffany, soon Tiffany is plotting to make Dylan's life a living hell.

programme.title: Rear View Mirror
programme.desc: A young mother tries to escape her abusive, controlling husband and start a new life in an idyllic, peaceful beach town.

programme.title: Stealing in Suburbia
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Snowkissed
programme.desc: A travel-averse journalist chases her dream assignment, where she soon finds herself mentoring a handsome B&B owner who wants to be a tour guide.

programme.title: Love on the Reef
programme.desc: A smart and serious marine biologist and a fun-loving and laissez-faire dive instructor must team up to save their beloved reef from being destroyed before it's too late.

programme.title: The Marry Me Pact
programme.desc: Charlotte and Rory are best friends, and for his 30th he goes travelling around the world. A year later, Charlotte visits a psychic who tells her she is destined to be with Rory when he gets home. Rory comes home...but engaged.

programme.title: Modeled with Love
programme.desc: When model-maker Olivia's dad is set to retire from their firm, she believes she's the obvious pick to take over. Enter Simon, whose big picture thinking threatens to upend Olivia's comfortable bubble along with her role as successor.

programme.title: Love for Starters
programme.desc: To save her father's lake-front restaurant, a talented interior designer must partner with the celebrity chef her father hired without her knowledge to revamp the place before time runs out.

programme.title: Just for Showmance
programme.desc: Follows Tara Thompson whose presenting career starts to stall, and agrees to go on a TV show to marry her 'perfect match', Joe, a man she's never met. But she secretly tries to track him down to clarify that the marriage is just for show.

programme.title: Falling for the Competition
programme.desc: Molly runs the local mom's group and this year they're entering the prestigious Modern Parenting Group of the Year Contest. When a new to town dad, Ashley, sets up a rival dad's group, their competitive natures cause competition in town.

programme.title: Love for Starters
programme.desc: To save her father's lake-front restaurant, a talented interior designer must partner with the celebrity chef her father hired without her knowledge to revamp the place before time runs out.

programme.title: Stealing in Suburbia
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Pocket Dial Murder
programme.desc: Follows Stacey as she receives a pocket dial from her husband. She hears the death of a woman on the other end, and when her husband comes home, he says he has lost his phone.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E07 - Permanent Residence
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven find a long term camping spot out fo the snow and at a lower elevation. Laramy gets to work making a more permanent shelter and looking for food.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E08 - Focused on Food
programme.desc: Laramy locates some whitetail deer and focuses his efforts on hunting them.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E05 - Hunger Pains
programme.desc: Symptoms of starvation have set in for Chris and Casey, who haven’t eaten in days. When they cross paths with a grouse, the unexpected happens. Frustration peaks as the temperatures drop. The brothers set up a new camp, but will it help the hunt?

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E06 - White Out
programme.desc: With still no big game in sight, Chris and Casey are forced to rely on fishing for food. The cold temperatures have slowed down the fish, creating challenges. When Mother Nature brings a brutal snow storm, the brothers are tested likenever before.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E07 - Motherly Love
programme.desc: After weeks of trying to survive in Saskatchewan, Chris and Casey have yet to kill big game. Time is running out as the bear begin to hibernate. Mental willpower is wearing thin. But a message from back home changes everything.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E08 - Refuelled
programme.desc: A turn of events lifts the brothers’ spirits, but creates a huge hurdle they must overcome as they enter a new race against the clock.Chris and Casey reflect on the challenges they have faced so far, and the challenges that still lie ahead.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E09 - The End
programme.desc: In the exciting season finale, Chris lays it all on the line one last time while bear hunting. Casey must finish one final task to make the fruits of their labor worthwhile. As the brothers inch closer to safety, they wonder what the future holds.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S02:E06 - Stranded in the Alaska Wilderness Part 2
programme.desc: After a successful hunt., Adrian Knopps' hunting partner disappears taking their bear out to the boat. Now Adrian finds himself stranded on a tidal flat surround by bears and wolf packs and with massive storm bearing down on him. How will he survive?

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S02:E07 - The Journal
programme.desc: Pastor Mike Turner is on a solo hike across the continental divide in the unforgiving Wind Rivers Range of Wyoming when he becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder. He chronicles his grueling 11-day fight to survive in his own journal.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S02:E08 - Tree Stand Fall
programme.desc: Deer hunter Nathan Holcomb plummets from his tree stand. Every hunters' worst nightmare becomes Nathan's reality. With a broken back and paralyzed, Nathan must crawl out on his own to find help.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S02:E09 - Adrift Part 1
programme.desc: In what is regarded as one of greatest survival stories of the 20th Century, sailor Steven Callahan finds himself alone and adrift in a life raft after his boat, the Napoleon Solo sinks in the mid Atlantic.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S02:E10 - Adrift Part 2
programme.desc: Facing starvation, dehydration and predators from the deep, sailor Steven Callahan fights to survive not only the physical hardships, but also the mental and emotional strain of being adrift and alone in a disintegrating life raft.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E04 - White Death
programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse 7 has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E05 - The Struggle
programme.desc: Laramy remains stuck at Camp Hell Hole, nursing 7's leg, and struggling to survive in the freezing temperatures without food.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E06 - On the Move
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven leave camp Hell Hole and hit the trail again. They are headed for lower elevation in search of a more permanent place to call home.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E07 - Permanent Residence
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven find a long term camping spot out fo the snow and at a lower elevation. Laramy gets to work making a more permanent shelter and looking for food.

programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse 7 has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E05 - The Struggle
programme.desc: Laramy remains stuck at Camp Hell Hole, nursing 7's leg, and struggling to survive in the freezing temperatures without food.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E38 - HM The Queen A Remarkable Life
programme.desc: المرأة الأبرز في العصر الحديث هي ملكتنا الراحلة، إليزابيث الثانية. فقد حكمت لمدة 70 عاماً، وهي أطول فترة حكم في تاريخ بريطانيا. بعد أن كانت أميرة لم يكن من المفترض أن تكون ملكة، قادت إليزابيث الثانية البلاد إلى الازدهار بعد الحرب العالمية الثانية وأصبحت حاضرة بثبات في عالمنا المتغير. خلال ألف عام من الملكية البريطانية، من المرجح أن تكون إليزابيث الثانية واحدة من أبرز الملوك على الإطلاق.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E10 - Weathered and Worn
programme.desc: Die Brüder entwickeln eine Strategie und beginnen, sich dem Stier zu nähern. Auf halbem Weg steht der Stier auf und beginnt, ihnen entgegenzukommen. Er wendet sich gerade einen Moment, bevor Casey hinter seine Schulter zielen kann.

programme.title: Wardens - S04:E15 - Log Jam
programme.desc: Gefährliche Baumstämme im Flathead River bedrohen unvorbereitete Bootfahrer und Tubing-Fahrer.

programme.title: Wardens - S04:E16 - Casting Doubt
programme.desc: Eine Reihe von nicht lizenzierten Anglern zieht die Aufmerksamkeit von Wildhütern auf sich.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S20:E08 - Desert Mine Shafts
programme.desc: Tom and Kia are out in the desert exploring old mine shafts.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E04 - Untouched Atolls
programme.desc: يقع قبالة ساحل أفريقيا شريط من 115 جزيرة تسمى سيشيل. يعلّم ماريو جمهوره كيفية صيد أنواع الشعاب المرجانية. حتى أنه يحاول السباحة مع سمكة شراعية.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E05 - Heartbreak Tuna Capetown
programme.desc: يغامر ماريو في أعماق المحيط قبالة ساحل كيب تاون من أجل صيد سمك التونة العملاقة ذات الزعنفة الصفراء، ولكنه يجد نفسه يقضم أكثر مما يستطيع مضغه.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Uncharted - S01:E09 - Darkness
programme.desc: Pakistan/Texas Pt2. Jim continues his hunt through extremely dangerous but also beautiful areas of Pakistan.

programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots - S02:E02 - Without a Trace
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation pilots Joel Natwick and Josiah Freeman assist with a search and rescue for an experienced hiker deep in the winter wilderness.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E41 - Fergie The Downfall Of A Modern Duchess
programme.desc: هذه هي قصة سارة فيرجسون، التي كانت تُعرف في السابق بصاحبة السمو الملكي، دوقة يورك. لكنها الآن ليست متورطة في العائلة الملكية. لقد كانت شخصًا يبدو أنها كانت تملك كل شيء ولكنها فقدت كل شيء عندما ارتبط اسمها بفضيحة كبيرة.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E052
programme.desc: Clementina se muestra solidaria con Victoria cuando ésta, al saber que Nicolás y Federico regresaron a la ciudad, lamenta que todo entre su amado y ella se haya acabado de manera tan triste. Hilario le confiesa a Florencia que la trata con tanta consideración porque tiene la esperanza de que ella lo llegue a querer como él desea. Fernanda señala a Nicolás y Federico que van a ocultarle a todo el mundo, inclusive a Eugenia y a Antonieta, el verdadero motivo de la muerte de Leopoldo y dirán que fue un accidente de pesca. . La llegada de Jack interrumpe la conversación entre Nicolás y Victoria por un momento, pero la muchacha no duda en ratificarle a Del Casal, frente al actor, que lo ama y necesita saber que él la cree inocente para no perder la esperanza de que algún día puedan volver a amarse.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E053
programme.desc: La llegada de Jack interrumpe la conversación entre Nicolás y Victoria por un momento, pero la muchacha no duda en ratificarle a Del Casal, frente al actor, que lo ama y necesita saber que él la cree inocente para no perder la esperanza de que algún día puedan volver a amarse. Adelaida asegura a Hansen que sabe lo valioso que es el amor que siente por ella, pero considera que él no se merece un corazón confundido como el suyo sino alguien que corresponda a plenitud su amor; el empresario agradece las palabras de la señora y se marcha luego de asegurar que siente que ha valido la pena vivir por ella.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E62
programme.desc: Ezequiel plantea de forma desinteresada ayudar a Camila a encontrar a su mamá, pero ella expresa que será un trato en que ambos ganarán. Fausto sorprende a Julia con Gregorio en el apartamento de Amelia. Max, desahoga su dolor con Astrid, a quien Camila pidió que lo ayudara a olvidarla.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E63
programme.desc: Fuerte tensión cuando Max encuentra a Camila en la mansión López Méndez. Fausto y Patricia, duros y crueles, agreden a Julia, pero saben que el peor castigo vendrá de manos de su propio padre, Ezequiel.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E82
programme.desc: At the Santa María mansion, Clara Inés orders the workers to take Pastora away. Raul arrives and demands that they leave his mother alone.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E83
programme.desc: At the Santa Maria mansion, Clara argues with an inebriated Raul; therefore, Cristiano informs the couple that the hospice is on fire.

programme.title: Corazón Traicionado - S01:E82
programme.desc: Lorena confesses to Claudio that she is already aware that he is Alberto's real father - Meanwhile, in Alberto's room, he lets Gertrudis know that it is because of her that he is in that bed; because he discovered her plan.

programme.title: Corazón Traicionado - S01:E83
programme.desc: Moved by the great love she feels for Alberto and refusing to see how he would destroy himself by committing a madness, Lorena goes to Omar and his boss to file a complaint against Gertrudis Sotillo de Corona; accusing her of being responsible for the attack on her husband - Virginia, very terrified, is taken to the operating room for the delivery; Elvis takes her hands and reassures her, telling her that they will face this great moment together.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E58
programme.desc: En la habitación, Adriana se enfrenta de nuevo a los deseos inmensos de Cristian de hacerle el amor.

programme.desc: Adriana advierte a Cristian y a Carlos Raúl, que no se peleen por ella, como si fuera una olla del restaurante, exige respeto y decide que no quiere nada con ninguno de los dos.

programme.title: ARPO

programme.title: Gecko's Garage
programme.desc: Gecko's Garage is the repair shop that cares. Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether it's fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle that's stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: Insectibles
programme.desc: The series follows the adventures of a young boy - Zak, his grandfather, Gramps, and three bio-mechanically enhanced insects as they search to find pieces of the 'Shrinkinator' - the crazy invention that shrunk Zak and Gramps before it exploded. They need to evade the maniacal mosquito, Adilla, her devious daughter Lidia, and a whole host of underlings to locate the pieces of the Shrinkinator and get back to their 'normal' lives!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Mal, Alya, Arif, Nana, Endi and Zizi are ready to take on the new school year! But wait, they’re in for a surprise when their long lost friend, Adam makes a comeback! The gang is complete again! Or so they think. It’s form 4 and the gang is separated into science and arts streams. Best friends, Mal and Adam are separated and have to find a way to get back together. By the end of it, the gang are in for the biggest shock of their lives!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: SMK is closing down! What will the gang do? Worst still, Alya hasn’t been feeling like herself lately. She has trouble focusing and keeps messing up simple tasks. Mal, on the other hand, is going through an identity crisis. He hates football now and really wants to quit, but it’s so hard. By the end of it, they come out stronger. They have a newfound inspiration to save the school!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Before the gang can save the school, they need to figure out why the school is closing down first. Through some snooping around, they find out that the school is being bought over by a snack company to build their factory! The school is in such a bad shape that it became very affordable. The gang know what they must do: Gotong royong to increase the value of the school. While Alya and Adam are serious about saving the school, their friends are goofing off, causing a riff among the group.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Adam has a new plan: To have the whole school’s buy-in to save the school through a petition! To do that, they need to form a committee. However, the group quickly falls apart. Mal discovers that if they continue to pursue the petition, Nana’s sister will lose her job. As their leader, Mal decides to stop their pursuit completely. By the end of it, Adam finally finds out the company taking over the school is his father’s company!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang discovers that Megah Holdings is conducting an interview at school. It’s the perfect opportunity to… sabotage it! Mal, however, is distracted by the gossip social media account, TerLetop, that exposed Cikgu Aini as Mal’s mother! Worse still, Adam didn’t back Mal up as his best friend. During the interview with Megah Holdings, Adam is shocked to find that the person being interviewed is actually his father!

programme.title: Dee The Series
programme.desc: Dee bersama adik dan ibunya Amy, memulakan hidup baru di KL apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia baru untuk Dee yang penuh dengan muzik, gelak ketawa dan air mata.

Mal, on the other hand, is going through an identity crisis. He hates football now and really wants to quit, but it’s so hard. By the end of it, they come out stronger. They have a newfound inspiration to save the school!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Before the gang can save the school, they need to figure out why the school is closing down first. Through some snooping around, they find out that the school is being bought over by a snack company to build their factory! The school is in such a bad shape that it became very affordable. The gang know what they must do: Gotong royong to increase the value of the school. While Alya and Adam are serious about saving the school, their friends are goofing off, causing a riff among the group.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Adam has a new plan: To have the whole school’s buy-in to save the school through a petition! To do that, they need to form a committee. However, the group quickly falls apart. Mal discovers that if they continue to pursue the petition, Nana’s sister will lose her job. As their leader, Mal decides to stop their pursuit completely. By the end of it, Adam finally finds out the company taking over the school is his father’s company!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang discovers that Megah Holdings is conducting an interview at school. It’s the perfect opportunity to… sabotage it! Mal, however, is distracted by the gossip social media account, TerLetop, that exposed Cikgu Aini as Mal’s mother! Worse still, Adam didn’t back Mal up as his best friend. During the interview with Megah Holdings, Adam is shocked to find that the person being interviewed is actually his father!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: After another failed plan, the gang turns to Alya for ideas. However, Alya is distracted by a class pop quiz and decides to sit out of saving the school this time. Without Alya, the gang decides it’s better to also focus on their studies first. While Alya thinks this is her time to shine and redeem her old self, her grades still plummet. She then turns to the unthinkable: to cheat in her exam! Consequently, causing her to be stripped off of her prefect position.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Alya navigates through school as a normal student now, while Zizi sets out to find out what is Adam’s relationship with Dato Idris. Meanwhile, Puan Bariah has called Alya’s parents to school due to her recent bad behaviour. Mal ends up consoling Alya, revealing that he lost his father due to the pandemic. Zizi finally finds out that Dato Idris is Adam’s father. By the end of it, while Adam is heading home, he sees that an Upacara Pecah Tanah will commence soon.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang regroup and decide that they will do a public demonstration during the Upacara Pecah Tanah. Zizi, on the other hand, tells Adam to talk to his father about it. TerLetop suddenly posts that there’s a special exposé. Adam accuses Zizi for being the person behind the account. Zizi denies. The Upacara Pecah Tanah carries on as planned. By the end of it, the TerLetop account exposes Zizi as Dato Idris’s daughter. Dato Idris exclaims that actually, Adam is his son instead!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang is disappointed in Adam. He tries to explain himself, to no avail. Adam wants to win his friends back and asks for Zizi’s help. Meanwhile, Cikgu Aini gets into trouble with the school principal because of the public demonstration at the Upacara Pecah Tanah. Mal apologises to Cikgu Aini after he finds out that she was trying to protect him from getting expelled. By the end, Adam discovers the person behind the TerLetop account is Arif!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Dato Idris is finalising the contract in Megah Holdings taking over SMK. Adam finally has the guts to confront his father. However, it’s no use. Arif revives the TerLetop account for one last hurrah. At the school, students, teachers and the public show up in support of SMK. Dato Idris finally caves in and tears the contract. Life in SMK resumes back to normal. Mal finally regains his old identity as a footballer. We also find out that Alya has been secretly gifting Mal cupcakes all along!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Mal, Alya, Arif, Nana, Endi and Zizi are ready to take on the new school year! But wait, they’re in for a surprise when their long lost friend, Adam makes a comeback! The gang is complete again! Or so they think. It’s form 4 and the gang is separated into science and arts streams. Best friends, Mal and Adam are separated and have to find a way to get back together. By the end of it, the gang are in for the biggest shock of their lives!

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The extremly cute capybara loves massage, black-footed penguins from Africa show off their superb diving abilities, be careful cause mini pigs aren't mini in size at all, subverting your imagination towards them, and uncovering ecology of the incredible gentle giant giraffe. "Cute Pet Guide" invites you to a trip to the zoo full of surprises!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt rushes off to answer an urgent call from Flamingoland, where a pregnant rare pygmy goat may need an emergency caesarean. Eight abandoned baby rabbits need some very close attention while back at the zoo there's been trouble at the lemur house. A fight has left one female with a nasty wound but she'd reluctant to receive treatment.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In Birkenhead, Inspector Anthony Joynes is accompanied by the police to attend an unlocked and empty property. Inside he finds Teddy, the terrified Terrier cross that has a flea infestation so bad that he's missing half his fur. One-year-old Teddy is incredibly nervous, but will he be able to overcome his fears and allow the RSPCA to offer him help?

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: The Japanese animated film My Neighbor Totoro, which is popular all over the world is the childhood memory of many. Totoro's classic furry body, round eyes and cute expression are very endearing. In South America, there is a kind of chinchilla that looks very similar to Totoro in the film. I heard that Taiwan now allows legal imports of these animals for breeding! Today, let’s follow the Totoro zoo owner Molly and fall in love with the soft and cute charm of this animation star!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: We've got stupid vs intelligent dogs, talented dogs, sporty dogs, pug life, dogs getting stuck, sleepy dogs, and dogs acting like humans.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the world’s largest and most famous dog show: "Crufts".nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled "Best in Show". These are the loveable family pets competing to win the "Scruffts" title.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: At Flamingoland two lambs have worrying scabs in their mouths and Dr. Matt is concerned it could be infectious. He tries to help a family save their much-loved pet but the future looks bleak for Rosie the hen. Meanwhile another family's pet dog doesn't take too kindly to the attentions of a vet. And Aztec the Harris Hawk needs a spot of surgery.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: We've got monkey criminals, magic and mirrors, cheeky monkeys, monkey pals, banana loving primates, baby monkeys, monkeys vs cameras, monkeys out on the town, and monkeys acting like us humans.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Sulcata tortoises are the third largest land tortoise in the world, native to the Sahel Corridor in Africa. They do not come from the desert!!! They need to take baths and drink water too!!!nThey are 5 to 7 centimeters tall at birth, with bright black eyes that are super attractive. They grow really fast when healthy, adults can reach 0.9 meters in size and live over 100 years. But they will easily catch a cold and get sick if you are not careful. How to keep your turtles healthy? Let’s hear what the experts say!

programme.title: Scruffts

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Lucy the Staffie cross has been kept inside a dark house for so long that it's affected her eyes and she is extremely overweight. She is taken into the RSPCA's care but will Lucy be able to shed some pounds and adapt to life in the great outdoors?

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: Dogs are not only man's best friend, they can also serve as therapists. "Cute Pet Guide" help you train your dog to become a therapy dog. Aside from canned dog food, owners can be more attentive and prepare sumptuous meals for their pets through chef video tutorials. "Cute Pet Guide" will present you and your furry babies with exquisite dishes of love!

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Nazril tidak dapat menipu dirinya sendiri yang cinta pertamanya adalah Maisara, namun tidak semudah itu lagi dia hendak menunjukkan rasa cinta itu lagi. Apa yang dilakukan Maisara sangat menyakitkan dan inilah masa untuk ‘mengajar’ Maisara.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Nazril mempersoalkan Aidil yang ambil berat tentang kehidupan isteri orang. Maisara pelik apabila Aidil mengatakan yang dia sanggup memberi berapa saja dimahukan Maisara kalau Maisara sudi terima dia menjadi suami.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Puan Norida tahu Nazril masih menyayangi Maisara walaupun perlakuan mesra itu dibuat-buat depannya. Maisara buat perangai lagi bila Nazril tiada di sisi dan mangsanya adalah Manja. Maisara marah bila mengajar Manja untuk membuat semua perkara dengan betul

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Geram Maisara seolah tidak mampu dibendung lagi kerana Nurul Huda mula gunakan cara kotor untuk mengenakannya tetapi Nurul Huda buat sepeti biasa, seperti seorang ustazah yang ‘suci murni’.

programme.title: Abang Bomba I Love You
programme.desc: Lily is impressed with Raykal, a member of firemen who always rescues her until she falls in love with him. But Mawar will never let Lily gets what she wanted.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara naik hantu. Dia menolak, menampar-nampar dan menarik tudung Nurul Huda. Dia tidak peduli kalau Nurul Huda mahu mendapatkan Nazril, tapi dia tidak suka diburuk-burukkan oleh Nurul Huda. Nazril pula menuduh Maisara bukan-bukan.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Nurul Huda sakit hati melihat kemesraan Nazril dan Maisara, dan Puan Norida yang terlalu gembira dengan hubungan anak dan menantunya yang semakin pulih. Nurul Huda mengapi-apikan Kak Esah dengan mengatakan ada penipuan terbesar Maisara yang akan membantu mereka sisihkan Maisara.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Nurul Huda menasihati Nazril supaya tidak teruskan penipuan itu atau dia yang akan sampaikan sendiri dekat Puan Norida. Nurul Huda mempersoalkan sampai bila Nazril hendak menyiksa diri kerana dia tahu Nazril tidak bahagia bersama Maisara.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara katakan yang dia boleh hidup sendiri tanpa Nazril. Qistina tidak setuju dengan keputusan Maisara untuk berpisah dengan Nazril. Qistina mengingatkan yang Maisara tidak boleh memikirkan tentang dirinya saja, dan seharusnya memikirkan tentang anak dalam kandungannya.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara mengungkapkan perasaan cintanya, Nazril terus memintas dengan mengatakan cintanya sudah masuk ke liang lahad. Hatinya kosong dan semua sudah berakhir. Maisara menangis lagi. Dari kata-kata Nazril membayangkan hubungan itu retak menanti belah.

programme.desc: Emi, Zikri and Dhiya are good friends. But their fate changed when Erni asked Dhiya to marry her husband. Their friendship and affections turn into extreme jealousy that will involve the lives of loved ones.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Polis berjaya menahan Arissa sebelum sempat beliau menyerahkan Mimi kepada ibu bapanya. Zaki cuba mendapatkan kata sepakat dengan Rafael supaya menarik balik kes penculikan tersebut. Rafael sedia menarik balik kes tersebut dengan syarat, Arissa dan Zarina turut sama membatalkan pendedahan kes kematian langgar lari Zariman.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Setelah dilepaskan daripada tahanan polis, berlaku pertelingkahan antara Arissa dan Yaya sehingga Yaya keluar dari rumah. Zaki dan Zarina bersama-sama menenangkan Arissa untuk memastikan fikiran Arissa tidak terganggu. Diana masih tidak berpuas hati dengan keputusan Rafael menarik balik kes penculikan Mimi terhadap Arissa dan merancang untuk mencederakan Arissa.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Kematian Zaki mengakibatkan fikiran Arissa terganggu semula. Diana menyembunyikan diri setelah berita kematian Zaki dilaporkan dan pihak Polis sedang mencari beliau. Rafael yang khuatir dengan kondisi mental Arissa, cuba memujuk Diana untuk menyerah diri sebelum Arissa menjumpai beliau

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Diana masih berbelah bagi untuk menyerah diri kepada pihak polis. Sementara Suraya mula bimbang jika Arissa bertindak diluar kawalan selepas apa yang telah berlaku. Situasi semakin meruncing buat Rafael apabila gagal untuk menghubungi Diana. Rafael semakin risau sesuatu yang buruk telah terjadi kepada Diana.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Sesuatu yang buruk telah berlaku kepada Diana sehingga menyebabkan kematiannya. Rafael telah ditahan oleh pihak polis kerana terlibat didalam kes pembunuhan Diana. Rafael sedaya upaya cuba untuk ingat kembali apa yang sebenarnya berlaku pada malam Diana dibunuh.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara naik hantu. Dia menolak, menampar-nampar dan menarik tudung Nurul Huda. Dia tidak peduli kalau Nurul Huda mahu mendapatkan Nazril, tapi dia tidak suka diburuk-burukkan oleh Nurul Huda. Nazril pula menuduh Maisara bukan-bukan.

programme.title: Diva Dari Jakarta
programme.desc: Erin dan Ejot sering dibandingkan dari segi paras rupa. Sehingga suatu hari sesuatu telah berlaku kepada Erin yang mengubah segalanya.

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Nasiya
programme.desc: Ketika melarikan diri dari bekas suaminya, Ihyana telah mengalami kemalangan tetapi dia bernasib baik kerana telah diselamatkan oleh satu entiti luar biasa yang telah mengubah kelakuannya.

programme.title: We’ll be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: We’ll be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Suamiku Encik Beruang
programme.desc: Ani, the most beautiful girl in the village, who is ever man's fantasy, decides to marry Mr. Bear as her husband, much to everyone's surprise. As for the chief village, he intend to organise the "wedding of the year".

programme.title: Menanti Hari Itu
programme.desc: Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu terhadap anak kandungnya yang tidak pernah terpadam meskipun si anak menjauhkan diri akibat hasutan keluarga angkatnya sendiri.

programme.title: Kecundang Sebelum Menjanda
programme.desc: Hari terbahagia dalam hidup Nora berubah menjadi suram bila tunangnya menarik diri pada hari pernikahan mereka. Tambah buruk lagi, hari selepas tragedi itu asyik berulang atas sebab-sebab misteri.

programme.title: Aku Raja Lawak
programme.desc: Silah nak jadi pelawak yang terkenal, cuma di kampungnya tak ada peluang pekerjaan pelawak sepenuh masa. Tapi dia tetap mendapat sokongan padu daripada peminat nombor satunya – iaitu Faris, anaknya.

programme.title: Bayangan Emilia
programme.desc: Rita berpindah masuk ke banglo Ungku Mahmud dan mula merasai akan kehadiran roh yang seperti tidak senang dengan kehadirannya disitu. Apakah misteri di sebalik rumah banglo tersebut?

programme.title: Oh Speak English Please
programme.desc: Kisah Sally anak remaja moden yang merasa malu dengan ibunya kerana tidak pandai berbahasa Inggeris dan berketrampilan agak kekampungan. Lakonan Rozita Che Wan dan Zahirah MacWilson.

programme.title: Striker Hati Ayah
programme.desc: Sofia susah untuk memilih antara dua calon, Raf atau Noah. Lalu meminta pendapat ayahnya, Adam. Kini dua lelaki tersebut terpaksa memenangi hati ayah Sofia, seorang peminat fanatik bola.

programme.title: Gebu Gebu Manis
programme.desc: Kisah Hamdi dan Dolah yang memulakan perniagaan dodol tetapi sering disabotaj oleh Amira yang cemburu dengan perniagaan dua orang sahabat ini.

programme.title: Wartawan Kampung
programme.desc: Mustaqim yang tidak habis belajar, pulang ke kampung mewujudkan laman web kampung disokong Tok Ketua Kampung Kambing. Untuk mempopularkan laman web itu, Mak Jah dan Mak Temah dilantik menjadi wartawan kampung untuk bahagian berita gosip dan hangat yang merancang untuk merampas laman web itu untuk kepunyaan sendiri. Akhirnya, berita menjadi finah, kampung pula menjadi porak-poranda.

programme.title: Lukisan Cinta
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khairul dan Natasha saling mencintai tetapi ditentang bapa Natasha kerana Khairul memilih kerjaya sebagai pelukis. Apakah kesudahan cinta mereka?

programme.title: Laksa Di Ambang Wati
programme.desc: Demi mendapatkan resepi laksa terbaik di Pulau Pinang, Mail dan kawan- kawan sanggup berbaik dengan Wati, gadis yang tak berapa lawa. Namun setelah Wati disunting oleh usahawan kosmetik terkenal, hidup Wati berubah dan Mail betul- betul jatuh cinta pada Wati.

programme.desc: Millionaire Thornton Melon's (Rodney Dangerfield) son is a college misfit, so Thornton lends some fatherly support...by enrolling as a fellow freshman! Who cares if he never finished high school? Thornton's pockets are deep enough to buy his way in! But when he steals his professor's girlfriend (Sally Kellerman), Thornton goes just a little too far. Now, he'll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account - or go back to being the world's wealthiest dropout!

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job

programme.title: Sides & Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.title: Fun with Woks
programme.desc: Using her trusty wok, host Mary Tang cooks up some classic Chinese take-out favourites.

programme.title: Vietnam's Love for Noodles
programme.desc: Fun host Lisa Nguyen shows us just how versatile noodles are with four different recipes.
