programme.desc: Up the Dish's four resourceful hosts raise the stakes with dishes inspired by classic French Onion Soup.

programme.title: Pork was Made for Barbeques
programme.desc: Host Spencer Watts shows us four of his favorite grilled pork recipes that will have you salivating.

programme.title: Fruit on the ‘Q
programme.desc: Fruit can elevate a BBQ master’s repertoire like nothing else. Join Chef Spencer Watts as he shows you his favourite fruit-forward recipes for the ‘Q!

programme.title: Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Sun’s out, the barbecue is lit and host Spencer Watts is ready to introduce us to a vegetable family we didn’t even know we loved… Allium!

programme.title: Cheesy BBQ
programme.desc: Chef Spencer Watts gets a little cheesy as grills up four flavourful and decadent dishes using cheese as the main ingredient.

programme.title: Pantry Pasta
programme.desc: Keep your pantry stocked with a few basic staples, and you’ll always have ingredients on hand for dinner, especially for pasta night. In this episode, Frankie creates delicious pasta dishes with the kitchen’s best-kept secret weapon – the pantry.

programme.title: Bring Your Own Lunch
programme.desc: Frankie is all about BYOL - bring your own lunch. It’s not only good for your wallet, it’s good for your health. Skip the vending machine and the cafeteria in favor of creative, cost effective and easy-to-transport midday meals.

programme.title: Summer BBQ
programme.desc: Summer is coming to a close but there’s still a bounty of fresh, seasonal produce to enjoy. Celebrate with Frankie as he makes some of his favorite cookout classics that’ll take you from a weekend picnic to a backyard BBQ, with or without a grill.

programme.title: The Future is Flavor
programme.desc: Frankie harnesses the power of time to transform simple ingredients into flavorful goods that’ll stick around for a long time. Learn the basics of preserving, pickling & curing to make dinner anything but a struggle. It just takes a little patience.

programme.title: Cabbage, cabbage, cabbage
programme.desc: Cabbage has long been an underrated green on the field, and it’s about time Frankie gives it a starring role. This leafy head proves itself as the versatile ingredient we need it to be, affordable year around, delicious and filling.

programme.title: Crunchy
programme.desc: Reaching textural nirvana is never easy, but Frankie explores several ways to achieve the perfect crunch in his dishes, both savory and sweet. Add this elusive element to your recipes without adding cost to your budget.

programme.title: Pantry Pasta
programme.desc: Keep your pantry stocked with a few basic staples, and you’ll always have ingredients on hand for dinner, especially for pasta night. In this episode, Frankie creates delicious pasta dishes with the kitchen’s best-kept secret weapon – the pantry.

programme.title: Bring Your Own Lunch
programme.desc: Frankie is all about BYOL - bring your own lunch. It’s not only good for your wallet, it’s good for your health. Skip the vending machine and the cafeteria in favor of creative, cost effective and easy-to-transport midday meals.

programme.title: Summer BBQ
programme.desc: Summer is coming to a close but there’s still a bounty of fresh, seasonal produce to enjoy. Celebrate with Frankie as he makes some of his favorite cookout classics that’ll take you from a weekend picnic to a backyard BBQ, with or without a grill.

programme.title: The Future is Flavor
programme.desc: Frankie harnesses the power of time to transform simple ingredients into flavorful goods that’ll stick around for a long time. Learn the basics of preserving, pickling & curing to make dinner anything but a struggle. It just takes a little patience.

programme.title: World of Burgers!
programme.desc: It’s burger day! Chef Dale tackles three classics with a full flavor spin. Game changing Pho Burgers with bone marrow, toasted milk bread Ahi Tuna patty melts, and Chori Pan Burgers with a fried egg and shrimp chips.

programme.title: Grilled Loco Moco and Huli Huli Chicken
programme.desc: The options are plentiful when Chef Dale smothers grilled Loco Moco with a mushroom gravy, salty and sweet Huli Huli Chicken with charred pineapple, and healthy scoops of Tuna Water Chestnut poke or mac salad.

programme.title: Street Eats off the Grill
programme.desc: Japan, Thailand, Turkey, and Mexico street foods inspire Dale to grill with dynamically preparing Chili-Cuman Lamb Mushroom sticks, Grilled pork and shrimp shumai, and scallion pancakes with brown butter labneh.

programme.title: Sizzlin' Summer Fruits
programme.desc: Summertime seasonal fruit pampers your tastebuds. Chef Dale grills blistered grapes with ham wrapped Trout, Peaches with smoked Pork Chops, Watermelon with halloumi, and Chargrilled Cherries with chocolate Mousse.

programme.title: 4th of July Remixed
programme.desc: It’s 4th of July and Chef Dale is ready to celebrate by grilling up his takes on summer bbq classics, like his galbi smash double cheeseburger with kimchi special sauce, honey butter steak fries, and char sui bbq ribs.

programme.title: It's Taco Time
programme.desc: Tacos are the way to Chef Dale’s heart, and to prove it, he’s grilling up a sweet and smoky lemongrass and guajillo pork with pineapple, served with coconut and cotija cheese corn and an avocado jicama salad.

programme.title: Restaurant-Style Whole Roast Fish
programme.desc: Grilling isn’t only about fast and casual dinners. Chef Dale grills to impress with this elegant, restaurant quality meal of whole roasted fish, coconut milk grits, and snow pea, watermelon and tamarind salad.

programme.title: The Chicken Episode
programme.desc: If you’re going to grill chicken, you’ll want to make it good. Chef Dale likes to kick up the heat with his angry chicken, a spicy, spatchcocked and grilled whole chicken, and his kung pao chicken wings.

programme.title: Brunch On The Grill
programme.desc: Wake up, it’s time to grill! Chef Dale greets the day with a showstopping dutch baby pancake and tangerine syrup, crispy hash browns topped with creme fraiche and roe, and a ham steak smothered in sweet cherry mostarda and red eye gravy.

programme.title: Vegetables, But Delicious
programme.desc: Grilling is the perfect way to imbue your veggies with deliciousness. Chef Dale crafts a family style platter of trumpet mushrooms, eggplant marinated in spicy ssam jang, and charred yellow squash served with a green goddess dressing.

programme.title: Kabobs and Skewers
programme.desc: Kabobs and skewers are a family tradition for Chef Dale. This Mediterranean-inspired meal features beef and shrimp kabobs with grilled tomatoes, potatoes, and eggplant, all served on warm pita with a tangy white sauce.

programme.title: End of Summer Seafood Feast
programme.desc: The end of summer is near, and Chef Dale goes out in style with a giant seafood feast! Lobster, crab, clams, shrimp, and scallops, all served directly on the table with plenty of buttery garlic bread. Thanks for watching, and until we grill again!

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and don’t forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: Sausage Egg & Cheese All Day Long
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings out the best of brunch with sweet and savory hits such as Bacon Wrapped Dates Stuffed with Chorizo, Maple Sausage, Egg, & Cheese Fried Rice, and the tastiest BBQ Duck, Egg, & Corn Scallion Pancake Sandwiches you’ve ever eaten.

programme.title: Summer Surf 'n' Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster & steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf ‘n’ turf by creating Pork & Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato & Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Perfectly Prepared Steaks
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, & grill up the biggest and best steaks out there. From a Hanger Steak with Salsa Verde to a Ribeye with Ginger Chili Relish, and tops it all off with the father of all steaks… The Porterhouse.

programme.title: Pizza Slice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill throws a pizza party with her delicious homemade pies! She creates a sweet and savory pie with spicy pepperoni & pineapple, a tangy BBQ chicken pizza, a grandma deep dish pie with mozzarella & chorizo, and an herby salad flatbread.

programme.title: Plantains and Rice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill celebrates Hispanic Heritage Month with her mom’s recipes as well as some of her own. She’ll whip up a coconut coquito cocktail, Cuban-style black beans, a garlicky arroz con pollo with sofrito, and some salty and sweet plantains.

programme.title: Loaded Dogs & Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to sample a modern spin on classic deli fare, heavily loaded low-riding hot dogs, frosty & fruity Taiwanese snow ice, and fancy French cocktails from a rotating carousel bar.

programme.title: Brooklyn’s Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes on the best pizza party crawl that Brooklyn has to offer. He’ll try a Neo-Neapolitan pie, a classic coal oven favorite, he’ll hit up a modern joint with innovative toppings, and a cozy Italian-owned neighborhood spot.

programme.title: Smash Burgers & A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, & Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austin’s best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin’ beer garden & sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls & Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonio’s best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza takes a LOT of bites out of the big apple as he samples warm pillowy bagels & schmear, grabs pierogies at an old school Ukrainian spot, gets the scoop on innovative ice cream flavors, and slurps up some real ramen.

programme.title: Pho, Poke, & Pig in O’ahu
programme.desc: Frankie explores Hawaii's O’ahu island to get nourished from fresh tuna poke, heartfelt Pho, and hand-pounded poi.

programme.title: Quail, Alligator Sausage, & Gumbo in New Orleans
programme.desc: Frankie stops by New Orleans to chow down on lacquered quail, a beast of a Po Boy, and Creole Beef Daube.

programme.title: Lunch That Goes the Distance
programme.desc: Frankie fuels up for action making hot Oatmeal, and Energy Date Balls, before he cooks up the perfect post-ride feast of cheesy Juicy Lucy Burgers, Ramp-loaded pasta salad, and a maple ginger switchel to cool it all down.

programme.title: Pasta From Scratch
programme.desc: Frankie explores his Italian roots, pairing each pasta shape with its perfect sauce—from Cavatelli with Super Green Sauce to Pappardelle in pork ragout, ricotta Gnocchi with punchy anchovy pecorino, and cozy Squash Orzotto with bloomed poppy seeds.

programme.title: Getting the Band Back Together
programme.desc: Frankie reunites his old band for a jam session and a spin on a college-era classic — featuring Shoyu Ramen with Tare Eggs, sweet and savory Chicken Meatballs, Seaweed Cucumber Salad, and a crispy Okonomiyaki pancake.

programme.title: Italian Smokehouse
programme.desc: Frankie fires up a steakhouse-style spread with Italian flair from golden beets and buttery mushrooms to a sizzling Bistecca alla Fiorentina steak with salmoriglio sauce, and a smooth cold brew affogato granita.

programme.title: The Wonderful World of Pizza
programme.desc: Frankie makes pizza magic with two incredible doughs, turning his kitchen into a pizza party with grilled sausage pizza, cheesy Grandma Pies, golden Panzerotti, and a sweet dessert pizza topped with ricotta, berries, and honey.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: Pho, Poke, & Pig in O’ahu
programme.desc: Frankie explores Hawaii's O’ahu island to get nourished from fresh tuna poke, heartfelt Pho, and hand-pounded poi.

programme.title: Quail, Alligator Sausage, & Gumbo in New Orleans
programme.desc: Frankie stops by New Orleans to chow down on lacquered quail, a beast of a Po Boy, and Creole Beef Daube.

programme.title: Smash Burgers & A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, & Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austin’s best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin’ beer garden & sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Don’t let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankie’s got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Sweater Weather
programme.desc: The air is crisp and the leaves are changing, which means it’s time to gather ‘round the dinner table for hearty, seasonal meals on a budget. These warm dishes are sure to keep you cozy all season long.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls & Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonio’s best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: We Knead Pizza
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, it’s time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, you’re bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: The Commando
programme.desc: A DEA agent returns home with PTSD after a botched mission and must now protect his family from a home invasion when a recently freed convict and his henchmen come after their stash of millions hidden inside of the agent's home.

programme.title: Hideout
programme.desc: Evading police at a remote farmhouse after fumbling a robbery, four criminals discover that the family living there is not who they appear to be.

programme.title: Juvenile
programme.desc: Troublemaker Billy Forsetti falls for the beautiful Jennifer. But when a carjacking takes a turn for the worse, Billy finds himself in for trouble.

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption
programme.desc: When the most powerful criminal empire in the land comes crumbling down from within, it is up to a former henchman to put the puzzle pieces together in order to find those responsible and extract revenge.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

programme.title: Operation Sea Wolf
programme.desc: The German Navy and the last remaining U-Boats, were formed together for one last mission to attack the United States Homeland.

programme.title: Broken Star
programme.desc: Abandoned by her friends and family and with her career in jeopardy, starlet Markey Marlowe is sequestered in a duplex with a reclusive landlord who just may be more dangerous than she is.

programme.title: Project Legion
programme.desc: A young man trapped in his apartment with a swarm of demons outside his door must find a way to survive the night and escape from apartment 213.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: The Jews of Eastern Europe are being massacred by the thousands. Galvanised into action after the death of his wife, Hungarian barrister Sonson finds himself leading an inspirational fight back against the increasingly desperate and dangerous Nazis.

programme.title: Johnny & Clyde
programme.desc: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are on an endless crime spree. They decide to assemble a group of criminals and misfits to steal from Alana's casino and pull off the heist of the century.

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: The Commando
programme.desc: A DEA agent returns home with PTSD after a botched mission and must now protect his family from a home invasion when a recently freed convict and his henchmen come after their stash of millions hidden inside of the agent's home.

programme.title: Blindfire
programme.desc: A police officer who while responding to a violent hostage call, kills the African American suspect only to later learn of his innocence. Sensing this was a set-up, and facing repercussions, he must track down the person responsible while examining his own accountability and the ingrained racism which brought him to this point.

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption
programme.desc: When the most powerful criminal empire in the land comes crumbling down from within, it is up to a former henchman to put the puzzle pieces together in order to find those responsible and extract revenge.

programme.title: Pocket Dial Murder
programme.desc: Follows Stacey as she receives a pocket dial from her husband. She hears the death of a woman on the other end, and when her husband comes home, he says he has lost his phone.

programme.title: Stealing in Suburbia
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Just for Showmance
programme.desc: Follows Tara Thompson whose presenting career starts to stall, and agrees to go on a TV show to marry her 'perfect match', Joe, a man she's never met. But she secretly tries to track him down to clarify that the marriage is just for show.

programme.title: Falling for the Competition
programme.desc: Molly runs the local mom's group and this year they're entering the prestigious Modern Parenting Group of the Year Contest. When a new to town dad, Ashley, sets up a rival dad's group, their competitive natures cause competition in town.

programme.title: Just for Showmance
programme.desc: Follows Tara Thompson whose presenting career starts to stall, and agrees to go on a TV show to marry her 'perfect match', Joe, a man she's never met. But she secretly tries to track him down to clarify that the marriage is just for show.

programme.title: Falling for the Competition
programme.desc: Molly runs the local mom's group and this year they're entering the prestigious Modern Parenting Group of the Year Contest. When a new to town dad, Ashley, sets up a rival dad's group, their competitive natures cause competition in town.

programme.title: Three Dates to Forever
programme.desc: Maddie Mckenzie is a hard-working presenter whose drive and talent has made her a popular radio host. John Reed is a carefree tech entrepreneur who's more interested in hosting parties. The two couldn't be more different.

programme.title: Love for Starters
programme.desc: To save her father's lake-front restaurant, a talented interior designer must partner with the celebrity chef her father hired without her knowledge to revamp the place before time runs out.

programme.title: Mr. Pawsitively Perfect
programme.desc: An aspiring marketing designer's favorite foster dog is adopted by a famous but down on his luck furniture designer, whom she fears only wants the dog for his new image.

programme.title: Snowkissed
programme.desc: A travel-averse journalist chases her dream assignment, where she soon finds herself mentoring a handsome B&B owner who wants to be a tour guide.

programme.title: The Marry Me Pact
programme.desc: Charlotte and Rory are best friends, and for his 30th he goes travelling around the world. A year later, Charlotte visits a psychic who tells her she is destined to be with Rory when he gets home. Rory comes home...but engaged.

programme.title: Killer Cover Up
programme.desc: All-star soccer player Jenna Sims and her mom Sally are ready for a new start when they move to a new, sunny beach town. But when other members of her new soccer team start turning up dead and one ends up in a coma, Jenna finds herself accused of the crime.

programme.title: Stealing in Suburbia
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E41 - Fergie The Downfall Of A Modern Duchess
programme.desc: هذه هي قصة سارة فيرجسون، التي كانت تُعرف في السابق بصاحبة السمو الملكي، دوقة يورك. لكنها الآن ليست متورطة في العائلة الملكية. لقد كانت شخصًا يبدو أنها كانت تملك كل شيء ولكنها فقدت كل شيء عندما ارتبط اسمها بفضيحة كبيرة.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E38 - HM The Queen A Remarkable Life
programme.desc: المرأة الأبرز في العصر الحديث هي ملكتنا الراحلة، إليزابيث الثانية. فقد حكمت لمدة 70 عاماً، وهي أطول فترة حكم في تاريخ بريطانيا. بعد أن كانت أميرة لم يكن من المفترض أن تكون ملكة، قادت إليزابيث الثانية البلاد إلى الازدهار بعد الحرب العالمية الثانية وأصبحت حاضرة بثبات في عالمنا المتغير. خلال ألف عام من الملكية البريطانية، من المرجح أن تكون إليزابيث الثانية واحدة من أبرز الملوك على الإطلاق.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E10 - Weathered and Worn
programme.desc: Die Brüder entwickeln eine Strategie und beginnen, sich dem Stier zu nähern. Auf halbem Weg steht der Stier auf und beginnt, ihnen entgegenzukommen. Er wendet sich gerade einen Moment, bevor Casey hinter seine Schulter zielen kann.

programme.title: Wardens - S04:E15 - Log Jam
programme.desc: Gefährliche Baumstämme im Flathead River bedrohen unvorbereitete Bootfahrer und Tubing-Fahrer.

programme.title: Wardens - S04:E16 - Casting Doubt
programme.desc: Eine Reihe von nicht lizenzierten Anglern zieht die Aufmerksamkeit von Wildhütern auf sich.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S20:E08 - Desert Mine Shafts
programme.desc: Tom and Kia are out in the desert exploring old mine shafts.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E04 - Untouched Atolls
programme.desc: يقع قبالة ساحل أفريقيا شريط من 115 جزيرة تسمى سيشيل. يعلّم ماريو جمهوره كيفية صيد أنواع الشعاب المرجانية. حتى أنه يحاول السباحة مع سمكة شراعية.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E05 - Heartbreak Tuna Capetown
programme.desc: يغامر ماريو في أعماق المحيط قبالة ساحل كيب تاون من أجل صيد سمك التونة العملاقة ذات الزعنفة الصفراء، ولكنه يجد نفسه يقضم أكثر مما يستطيع مضغه.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Uncharted - S01:E09 - Darkness
programme.desc: Pakistan/Texas Pt2. Jim continues his hunt through extremely dangerous but also beautiful areas of Pakistan.

programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots - S02:E02 - Without a Trace
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation pilots Joel Natwick and Josiah Freeman assist with a search and rescue for an experienced hiker deep in the winter wilderness.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E41 - Fergie The Downfall Of A Modern Duchess
programme.desc: هذه هي قصة سارة فيرجسون، التي كانت تُعرف في السابق بصاحبة السمو الملكي، دوقة يورك. لكنها الآن ليست متورطة في العائلة الملكية. لقد كانت شخصًا يبدو أنها كانت تملك كل شيء ولكنها فقدت كل شيء عندما ارتبط اسمها بفضيحة كبيرة.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E42 - Diana A Model Princess
programme.desc: كان ذوق ديانا في الموضة أمراً غالباً ما ينظر إليه الناس عن كثب. فقد كانت لديها موهبة في اختيار الأزياء الأنيقة والراقية في آنٍ واحد، الأمر الذي كان يلفت الانتباه دائماً. كانت قبعاتها سمة بارزة أخرى؛ فغالباً ما كانت ترتدي تصاميم أنيقة تضفي لمسة من الأناقة على إطلالتها. كما كان شعرها مبدعًا أيضًا، وعادةً ما كان مصففًا بشكل أنيق مع لمسة خفيفة من الانسيابية، مما كان يحيط وجهها بشكل مثالي ويزيد من أناقة مظهرها.

programme.title: Dropped - S03:E01 - Best Moments Part 1
programme.desc: Die Brüder Chris und Casey Keefer blicken auf einige der besten Momente aus den ersten beiden Staffeln von Dropped zurück. Sie sprechen über ihre unvergesslichsten Solo-Jagden und wie sich die Show im Laufe der Zeit verändert hat.

programme.title: Dropped - S03:E02 - Best Moments Part 2
programme.desc: Die Brüder Chris und Casey Keefer blicken auf einige der besten Momente aus den ersten beiden Staffeln von Dropped zurück. Sie sprechen über Dinge hinter den Kulissen, die niemand gesehen hat, und geben einen Ausblick darauf, was in Staffel 3 auf uns zukommt.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E01 - Operation Caviar
programme.desc: Wächter aus Region 7 versammeln sich am Intake-Fischereigebiet am Yellowstone River, während die jährliche Paddlefish-Migration stattfindet. Sehen Sie sich Angler an, die versuchen, Paddlefish zu fangen, und die Wächter, die diejenigen fangen, die die Regeln brechen!

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E02 - Operation Camper
programme.desc: Der Tongue River Reservoir State Park im zentralen Süden Montanas ist im Sommer ein beliebter Ort für Menschen, die Spaß haben und angeln wollen. Aufseher Mike Krings hat viel zu tun, um sicherzustellen, dass alle sich gut verstehen, besonders wenn die Nacht hereinbricht.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S20:E09 - Lost Peg Leg Treasure
programme.desc: Tom and Kia are out metal detecting in the desert looking for the lost Peg Leg Treasure.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E06 - Getting Close to Black Death
programme.desc: في براري شمال جنوب أفريقيا، ينتشر الصيد غير المشروع في كل مكان، ولا يمكن أن تكون البرية أكثر خطورة. يريد ماريو أن يكون أول شخص في المنطقة يصطاد جاموس الكاب باستخدام القوس والسهم.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E07 - Hawaii Access Shane Dorian
programme.desc: ازدادت أعداد الغزلان المحورية في هاواي، مما يجعلها مشكلة كبيرة في هذه الجنة الخلابة في المحيط الهادئ. في هذه الحلقة، يلتقي ماريو مع شين دوريان، وهو راكب أمواج كبيرة، بينما يتوجهان في رحلة استكشافية.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Uncharted - S01:E10 - The Ancient Ones
programme.desc: Arctic. Jim and Corey's Arctic adventure starts with Muskox, an animal practically forgotten since pre-historic times in the Arctic.

programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots - S02:E03 - Salvage: Gone-Awry
programme.desc: Joel and Mark Barker tempt fate and fly into no man's land to find and salvage a white airplane in a snowy forest all while fighting hypothermia along the way.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E44 - 50 Glorious Years A Royal Celebration
programme.desc: تكريمًا لمرور 50 عامًا من الزواج بين جلالة الملكة وزوجها الأمير فيليب دوق الدنمارك، دوق إدنبره، وأمير اليونان والدنمارك.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E42 - Diana A Model Princess
programme.desc: كان ذوق ديانا في الموضة أمراً غالباً ما ينظر إليه الناس عن كثب. فقد كانت لديها موهبة في اختيار الأزياء الأنيقة والراقية في آنٍ واحد، الأمر الذي كان يلفت الانتباه دائماً. كانت قبعاتها سمة بارزة أخرى؛ فغالباً ما كانت ترتدي تصاميم أنيقة تضفي لمسة من الأناقة على إطلالتها. كما كان شعرها مبدعًا أيضًا، وعادةً ما كان مصففًا بشكل أنيق مع لمسة خفيفة من الانسيابية، مما كان يحيط وجهها بشكل مثالي ويزيد من أناقة مظهرها.

programme.title: Dropped - S03:E01 - Best Moments Part 1
programme.desc: Die Brüder Chris und Casey Keefer blicken auf einige der besten Momente aus den ersten beiden Staffeln von Dropped zurück. Sie sprechen über ihre unvergesslichsten Solo-Jagden und wie sich die Show im Laufe der Zeit verändert hat.

programme.title: Dropped - S03:E02 - Best Moments Part 2
programme.desc: Die Brüder Chris und Casey Keefer blicken auf einige der besten Momente aus den ersten beiden Staffeln von Dropped zurück. Sie sprechen über Dinge hinter den Kulissen, die niemand gesehen hat, und geben einen Ausblick darauf, was in Staffel 3 auf uns zukommt.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E01 - Operation Caviar
programme.desc: Wächter aus Region 7 versammeln sich am Intake-Fischereigebiet am Yellowstone River, während die jährliche Paddlefish-Migration stattfindet. Sehen Sie sich Angler an, die versuchen, Paddlefish zu fangen, und die Wächter, die diejenigen fangen, die die Regeln brechen!

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E02 - Operation Camper
programme.desc: Der Tongue River Reservoir State Park im zentralen Süden Montanas ist im Sommer ein beliebter Ort für Menschen, die Spaß haben und angeln wollen. Aufseher Mike Krings hat viel zu tun, um sicherzustellen, dass alle sich gut verstehen, besonders wenn die Nacht hereinbricht.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S20:E09 - Lost Peg Leg Treasure
programme.desc: Tom and Kia are out metal detecting in the desert looking for the lost Peg Leg Treasure.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E06 - Getting Close to Black Death
programme.desc: في براري شمال جنوب أفريقيا، ينتشر الصيد غير المشروع في كل مكان، ولا يمكن أن تكون البرية أكثر خطورة. يريد ماريو أن يكون أول شخص في المنطقة يصطاد جاموس الكاب باستخدام القوس والسهم.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E07 - Hawaii Access Shane Dorian
programme.desc: ازدادت أعداد الغزلان المحورية في هاواي، مما يجعلها مشكلة كبيرة في هذه الجنة الخلابة في المحيط الهادئ. في هذه الحلقة، يلتقي ماريو مع شين دوريان، وهو راكب أمواج كبيرة، بينما يتوجهان في رحلة استكشافية.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Uncharted - S01:E10 - The Ancient Ones
programme.desc: Arctic. Jim and Corey's Arctic adventure starts with Muskox, an animal practically forgotten since pre-historic times in the Arctic.

programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots - S02:E03 - Salvage: Gone-Awry
programme.desc: Joel and Mark Barker tempt fate and fly into no man's land to find and salvage a white airplane in a snowy forest all while fighting hypothermia along the way.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E44 - 50 Glorious Years A Royal Celebration
programme.desc: تكريمًا لمرور 50 عامًا من الزواج بين جلالة الملكة وزوجها الأمير فيليب دوق الدنمارك، دوق إدنبره، وأمير اليونان والدنمارك.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E053
programme.desc: La llegada de Jack interrumpe la conversación entre Nicolás y Victoria por un momento, pero la muchacha no duda en ratificarle a Del Casal, frente al actor, que lo ama y necesita saber que él la cree inocente para no perder la esperanza de que algún día puedan volver a amarse. Adelaida asegura a Hansen que sabe lo valioso que es el amor que siente por ella, pero considera que él no se merece un corazón confundido como el suyo sino alguien que corresponda a plenitud su amor; el empresario agradece las palabras de la señora y se marcha luego de asegurar que siente que ha valido la pena vivir por ella.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E054
programme.desc: Nicolás acusa a Victoria de haberle disparado a Leopoldo y asegura que Hilario escondió el cadáver para protegerla; la muchacha abofetea a Del Casal cuando éste la tilda de ser una persona malvada incapaz de tener piedad con nadie. Victoria cita a Builder para preguntarle cómo él sabía que Nicolás se desilusionó de ella luego de escuchar una grabación si ella en ningún momento le dijo algo al respecto. Nicolás asegura a Florencia que no quiere utilizarla para conseguir vengarse de los Guanipa y que si la busca es porque por ella y no porque le interese su ayuda.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E63
programme.desc: Fuerte tensión cuando Max encuentra a Camila en la mansión López Méndez. Fausto y Patricia, duros y crueles, agreden a Julia, pero saben que el peor castigo vendrá de manos de su propio padre, Ezequiel.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E64
programme.desc: Ezequiel pretende que Camila le entregue el cuaderno para conocer bien los detalles de la venganza. Luego, la sorprende al pedirle que se case con él a cambio de ayudarla pues si no hay boda, no hay trato ni sociedad.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E83
programme.desc: At the Santa Maria mansion, Clara argues with an inebriated Raul; therefore, Cristiano informs the couple that the hospice is on fire.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E84
programme.desc: When Raul is about to leave with Pastora, Tamara begs him to stay to prevent Gabriel and Clara Ines from getting married.

programme.title: Corazón Traicionado - S01:E83
programme.desc: Moved by the great love she feels for Alberto and refusing to see how he would destroy himself by committing a madness, Lorena goes to Omar and his boss to file a complaint against Gertrudis Sotillo de Corona; accusing her of being responsible for the attack on her husband - Virginia, very terrified, is taken to the operating room for the delivery; Elvis takes her hands and reassures her, telling her that they will face this great moment together.

programme.title: Corazón Traicionado - S01:E84
programme.desc: Carmen enters to see Virginia and finds her daughter crying in tears because her baby was taken away from her. - Determined not to give in and to clean her image at any cost, Gertrudis promises Alberto that if she can prove that Claudio is responsible for Marco Aurelio's death, she will kill him herself with her own hands.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E59
programme.desc: Adriana advierte a Cristian y a Carlos Raúl, que no se peleen por ella, como si fuera una olla del restaurante, exige respeto y decide que no quiere nada con ninguno de los dos.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E60
programme.desc: César encuentra a Carlos Raúl en un bar y lo saluda con mucho cariño, el médico no entiende la actitud de su hermano.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E055
programme.desc: Victoria promete a Builder hacer lo que él quiera para que la perdone; él le pide un beso que le diga que ella sabe que la ama y nunca sería capaz de hacerle daño. Florencia despierta feliz porque pasó la noche haciendo el amor con Nicolás; quien, sin embargo, está algo triste porque ese día es el entierro de su tío y ni siquiera un momento ha dejado de pensar en Victoria. Hilario aclara a Fernanda y Nicolás que su hija y él están ahí para firmar los papeles del traspaso de las tierras que les va a devolver; el señor Guanipa insta a la señora Alcoy a dejar claro si con ese trato va a comenzar la paz entre ambas familias. Felipe asegura a Clementina que es con ella con quien quiere tener una historia de amor; la muchacha lo rechaza luego de mencionar que Antonieta contestó una de sus llamadas y trató de humillarla con sus comentarios.Victoria, a gritos, le exige a Florencia que se vaya de su casa cuando aparecen Adelaida e Hilario a ver qué ocurre; ambos se sorprenden al ver ahí a la joven Zapata.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: After another failed plan, the gang turns to Alya for ideas. However, Alya is distracted by a class pop quiz and decides to sit out of saving the school this time. Without Alya, the gang decides it’s better to also focus on their studies first. While Alya thinks this is her time to shine and redeem her old self, her grades still plummet. She then turns to the unthinkable: to cheat in her exam! Consequently, causing her to be stripped off of her prefect position.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Alya navigates through school as a normal student now, while Zizi sets out to find out what is Adam’s relationship with Dato Idris. Meanwhile, Puan Bariah has called Alya’s parents to school due to her recent bad behaviour. Mal ends up consoling Alya, revealing that he lost his father due to the pandemic. Zizi finally finds out that Dato Idris is Adam’s father. By the end of it, while Adam is heading home, he sees that an Upacara Pecah Tanah will commence soon.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang regroup and decide that they will do a public demonstration during the Upacara Pecah Tanah. Zizi, on the other hand, tells Adam to talk to his father about it. TerLetop suddenly posts that there’s a special exposé. Adam accuses Zizi for being the person behind the account. Zizi denies. The Upacara Pecah Tanah carries on as planned. By the end of it, the TerLetop account exposes Zizi as Dato Idris’s daughter. Dato Idris exclaims that actually, Adam is his son instead!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang is disappointed in Adam. He tries to explain himself, to no avail. Adam wants to win his friends back and asks for Zizi’s help. Meanwhile, Cikgu Aini gets into trouble with the school principal because of the public demonstration at the Upacara Pecah Tanah. Mal apologises to Cikgu Aini after he finds out that she was trying to protect him from getting expelled. By the end, Adam discovers the person behind the TerLetop account is Arif!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Dato Idris is finalising the contract in Megah Holdings taking over SMK. Adam finally has the guts to confront his father. However, it’s no use. Arif revives the TerLetop account for one last hurrah. At the school, students, teachers and the public show up in support of SMK. Dato Idris finally caves in and tears the contract. Life in SMK resumes back to normal. Mal finally regains his old identity as a footballer. We also find out that Alya has been secretly gifting Mal cupcakes all along!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Mal, Alya, Arif, Nana, Endi and Zizi are ready to take on the new school year! But wait, they’re in for a surprise when their long lost friend, Adam makes a comeback! The gang is complete again! Or so they think. It’s form 4 and the gang is separated into science and arts streams. Best friends, Mal and Adam are separated and have to find a way to get back together. By the end of it, the gang are in for the biggest shock of their lives!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: SMK is closing down! What will the gang do? Worst still, Alya hasn’t been feeling like herself lately. She has trouble focusing and keeps messing up simple tasks. Mal, on the other hand, is going through an identity crisis. He hates football now and really wants to quit, but it’s so hard. By the end of it, they come out stronger. They have a newfound inspiration to save the school!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Before the gang can save the school, they need to figure out why the school is closing down first. Through some snooping around, they find out that the school is being bought over by a snack company to build their factory! The school is in such a bad shape that it became very affordable. The gang know what they must do: Gotong royong to increase the value of the school. While Alya and Adam are serious about saving the school, their friends are goofing off, causing a riff among the group.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Adam has a new plan: To have the whole school’s buy-in to save the school through a petition! To do that, they need to form a committee. However, the group quickly falls apart. Mal discovers that if they continue to pursue the petition, Nana’s sister will lose her job. As their leader, Mal decides to stop their pursuit completely. By the end of it, Adam finally finds out the company taking over the school is his father’s company!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang discovers that Megah Holdings is conducting an interview at school. It’s the perfect opportunity to… sabotage it! Mal, however, is distracted by the gossip social media account, TerLetop, that exposed Cikgu Aini as Mal’s mother! Worse still, Adam didn’t back Mal up as his best friend. During the interview with Megah Holdings, Adam is shocked to find that the person being interviewed is actually his father!

programme.title: Dee The Series
programme.desc: Dee bersama adik dan ibunya Amy, memulakan hidup baru di KL apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia baru untuk Dee yang penuh dengan muzik, gelak ketawa dan air mata.

programme.desc: Nini dan Haikal iaitu adik beradik tiri menjadi bosan apabila asyik bertukar rumah, justeru mereka merancang untuk menyatukan Hairi dan Lisa iaitu penjaga sementara mereka.

programme.title: Super Game Boy The Series (Astro Ceria)
programme.desc: Danial dan kawan-kawannya Ayu, Bob dan Nina kembali beraksi dengan gelagat mereka yang lucu dan menarik. Berjayakah misi mereka di dalam setiap episod? Jom kita saksikannya.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: After another failed plan, the gang turns to Alya for ideas. However, Alya is distracted by a class pop quiz and decides to sit out of saving the school this time. Without Alya, the gang decides it’s better to also focus on their studies first. While Alya thinks this is her time to shine and redeem her old self, her grades still plummet. She then turns to the unthinkable: to cheat in her exam! Consequently, causing her to be stripped off of her prefect position.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Alya navigates through school as a normal student now, while Zizi sets out to find out what is Adam’s relationship with Dato Idris. Meanwhile, Puan Bariah has called Alya’s parents to school due to her recent bad behaviour. Mal ends up consoling Alya, revealing that he lost his father due to the pandemic. Zizi finally finds out that Dato Idris is Adam’s father. By the end of it, while Adam is heading home, he sees that an Upacara Pecah Tanah will commence soon.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang regroup and decide that they will do a public demonstration during the Upacara Pecah Tanah. Zizi, on the other hand, tells Adam to talk to his father about it. TerLetop suddenly posts that there’s a special exposé. Adam accuses Zizi for being the person behind the account. Zizi denies. The Upacara Pecah Tanah carries on as planned. By the end of it, the TerLetop account exposes Zizi as Dato Idris’s daughter. Dato Idris exclaims that actually, Adam is his son instead!

programme.title: Dee The Series
programme.desc: Dee bersama adik dan ibunya Amy, memulakan hidup baru di KL apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia baru untuk Dee yang penuh dengan muzik, gelak ketawa dan air mata.

programme.title: Strawberi Karipap
programme.desc: Nini dan Haikal iaitu adik beradik tiri menjadi bosan apabila asyik bertukar rumah, justeru mereka merancang untuk menyatukan Hairi dan Lisa iaitu penjaga sementara mereka.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: At Flamingoland two lambs have worrying scabs in their mouths and Dr. Matt is concerned it could be infectious. He tries to help a family save their much-loved pet but the future looks bleak for Rosie the hen. Meanwhile another family's pet dog doesn't take too kindly to the attentions of a vet. And Aztec the Harris Hawk needs a spot of surgery.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: We've got monkey criminals, magic and mirrors, cheeky monkeys, monkey pals, banana loving primates, baby monkeys, monkeys vs cameras, monkeys out on the town, and monkeys acting like us humans.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Sulcata tortoises are the third largest land tortoise in the world, native to the Sahel Corridor in Africa. They do not come from the desert!!! They need to take baths and drink water too!!!nThey are 5 to 7 centimeters tall at birth, with bright black eyes that are super attractive. They grow really fast when healthy, adults can reach 0.9 meters in size and live over 100 years. But they will easily catch a cold and get sick if you are not careful. How to keep your turtles healthy? Let’s hear what the experts say!

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the world’s largest and most famous dog show: "Crufts".nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled "Best in Show". These are the loveable family pets competing to win the "Scruffts" title.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Lucy the Staffie cross has been kept inside a dark house for so long that it's affected her eyes and she is extremely overweight. She is taken into the RSPCA's care but will Lucy be able to shed some pounds and adapt to life in the great outdoors?

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: Dogs are not only man's best friend, they can also serve as therapists. "Cute Pet Guide" help you train your dog to become a therapy dog. Aside from canned dog food, owners can be more attentive and prepare sumptuous meals for their pets through chef video tutorials. "Cute Pet Guide" will present you and your furry babies with exquisite dishes of love!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt helps to save a badger knocked down by car but will it return to the wild? He relieves a cat with a particular problem and helps a farmer catch a runaway calf. Up at the Zoo he knocks out a polar bear and puts a Zebra back on her feet.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the world’s largest and most famous dog show: "Crufts".nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled "Best in Show". These are the loveable family pets competing to win the "Scruffts" title.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Samoyed dogs, known as "smiling angels" are in fact not easy to raise. They require enough love and dedication, especially extraordinary physical strength!!! For you to be happy and healthy with them.nIf you want to raise a Samoyed, or already own one, we hope you can give them the best care and love, and make them your best partners. Come and jot notes of the hard work and tears shared by expert owners :)!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as you've never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAP's, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. There's a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: At a house in Hull, Inspector Claire Little rescues two flea infested Staffordshire Bull Terriers named Roxy and Madison that are missing half of their fur. As Claire begins her investigation, will the scratching Staffies be able to recover?

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: What items should a novice cat owner prepare to welcome their cat home? Recommendation of the best breeds for beginners among all cute cats! Eat like a champion cat by following healthy recipes we reveal! Don’t be afraid if you have a destructive cat at home, a trainer will help you understand your cat’s out-of-control behavior, Angelic Cat Training Class has begin! When the owner goes on a trip, felines will have a great vacation at the cat hotel!

programme.title: (L) Berita Tengah Malam
programme.desc: Berita Tengah Malam yang memaparkan perkembangan terkini, isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Kembali Mencintai
programme.desc: Tengku Faal datang ke rumah Thiya dan meminta maaf serta membawa Thiya dan Salma ke Lumut. Keluarga gembira melihat kedatangan Salma, Thiya dan Tengku Faal.

programme.title: Citarasa Medika
programme.desc: Perkongsian hidangan untuk pesakit Gout bersama Chef Fikree Aznan iaitu Sup Labu bersama Roti Perancis, Lontong oleh Dr. Nurhashimah Mokhtar dan Punch Buah-buahan oleh Siti Nursafiyah Mohd Yusof.

programme.title: Oohaa! Aramaiti
programme.desc: Ooha Aramaiti meraikan keunikan budaya Sabah dan Sarawak melalui adat, seni dan tarian tradisional etnik seperti Bajau, Iban, dan Rungus.

programme.title: Drif King Malaysia
programme.desc: Bersama Bullzai Hamdan, Gui Foo Song serta Dato' Sayed Alfeizal (Penganjur Sukan Permotoran) dan Norshamsul Mat Nor (Pengurus Litar) berkongsi pengalaman tentang dunia drift.

programme.title: Tumit Tinggi 2025
programme.desc: Tumit Tinggi memaparkan kejayaan dan kehebatan wanita-wanita di Malaysia dalam pelbagai bidang dan kerjaya.

programme.title: Lelaki-Lelaki Dalam Hidupnya
programme.desc: Berjayakah Fendi melepasi ujian-ujian getir dari 3 orang abang Zara, Abang Long, Abang Zain dan Abang Zaki demi untuk mendapatkan restu dan persetujuan meminang Zara?

programme.desc: Bacaan Ar Rahman/ Al Mulk/ Yassin/ Al Waqiah

programme.desc: Saksikan program majalah wanita islamik yang menarik ini khas untuk anda.

programme.desc: Saksikan rancangan Iqra dan bertalaqqi bersama Ustaz Husaini Mahmur.

programme.desc: Selamat Pagi Malaysia rancangan bual bicara pagi dengan pelbagai segmen dan topik menarik merangkumi gaya hidup, isu semasa, pendidikan, ekonomi.

programme.title: Diari Nusantara
programme.desc: Suzana Murni ke Sarawak melihat sejarah pemerintahan Raja Brooke serta melawat Sungai Sarawak, Menara Jam, Bangunan Astana, Fort Magherita dan Galeria Ranee.

programme.title: Galaksi
programme.desc: Amirul Hazim membawa penonton meneroka misteri Batuan Angkasa. Penonton akan mengenali jenis-jenis asteroid dan meteor serta memahami risiko ancamannya terhadap Bumi.

programme.desc: Berita terkini yang memaparkan isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Africa's Hunter
programme.desc: Episod kali ini mengenai sekumpulan anjing liar di Lembah Luangwa di Zambia berada di kawasan seluas hampir 200 batu persegi. Puak Hyena yang berdekatan terpaksa melindungi makanan dan anak-anak mereka.

programme.desc: Perkembangan berita terkini, isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Tuhan Beri Aku Cinta

programme.title: Arena Siber
programme.desc: Arena Siber mendedahkan keseimbangan bermain e-sukan dengan sihat serta cara menangani ketagihan. Dari pembangunan akar umbi, persediaan menggilap bakat, serta kisah kejayaan atlet.

programme.title: (L) Berita Iban TVS
programme.desc: Berita Iban memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Iban

programme.title: (DL) Menarik Sepuluh
programme.desc: Menarik Sepuluh mengumpulkan 10 kisah unik dan menarik berlaku di mana sahaja

programme.title: (L) UTAMA 740
programme.desc: UTAMA 740 memaparkan berita terkini yang menyeluruh dan padat dari dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Sukan TVS
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan, perbincangan dan topik hangat sukan tanah air

programme.title: Decimal Point
programme.desc: Weekly business show is set to become your trusted source for all things business, economics, and current affairs. Your gateway to making informed decisions in today's fast-paced business environment.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live
programme.desc: Sepahtu Reunion mempersembahkan kisah-kisah komedi terbaharu secara langsung di hadapan penonton, bersama selebriti-selebriti undangan tanah air. Gelak sampai pengsan!

programme.title: As Husband as Wife
programme.desc: Zhou Quan resigns with excitement as his wife,Che Li,gains fame and becomes an entrepreneur.Accepts a new job with a 20,000 yuan salary,with his wife as his boss and son as his client,starting a new life.

programme.title: (L) TVS Nightline
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan peristiwa yang berlaku di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa English

programme.title: Jom Ke Sana
programme.desc: Sekian lama berkerja di luar negara,Kally ke Sarawak dan membuat keputusan untuk menerokai semula tempat menarik di Sarawak.Dia menghabiskan masa cutinya bersama kawan baiknya dengan cara "road trip"

programme.title: Border Towns of Sarawak
programme.desc: Documentary filmmaker Yusmal Ghazali explores borderlands, immersing in local life, meeting officials, villagers, entrepreneurs. Revealing history, traits, economy, tourism, post-pandemic challenges.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Nurul Huda sakit hati melihat kemesraan Nazril dan Maisara, dan Puan Norida yang terlalu gembira dengan hubungan anak dan menantunya yang semakin pulih. Nurul Huda mengapi-apikan Kak Esah dengan mengatakan ada penipuan terbesar Maisara yang akan membantu mereka sisihkan Maisara.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Nurul Huda menasihati Nazril supaya tidak teruskan penipuan itu atau dia yang akan sampaikan sendiri dekat Puan Norida. Nurul Huda mempersoalkan sampai bila Nazril hendak menyiksa diri kerana dia tahu Nazril tidak bahagia bersama Maisara.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara katakan yang dia boleh hidup sendiri tanpa Nazril. Qistina tidak setuju dengan keputusan Maisara untuk berpisah dengan Nazril. Qistina mengingatkan yang Maisara tidak boleh memikirkan tentang dirinya saja, dan seharusnya memikirkan tentang anak dalam kandungannya.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara mengungkapkan perasaan cintanya, Nazril terus memintas dengan mengatakan cintanya sudah masuk ke liang lahad. Hatinya kosong dan semua sudah berakhir. Maisara menangis lagi. Dari kata-kata Nazril membayangkan hubungan itu retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Abang Bomba I Love You
programme.desc: Lily is impressed with Raykal, a member of firemen who always rescues her until she falls in love with him. But Mawar will never let Lily gets what she wanted.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Dia tidak sengaja sakitkan hati isterinya tetapi dia tidak mahu berpura-pura lagi. Walaupun belum melepaskan Maisara tetapi kasih sayangnya takkan mungkin seperti dulu. Kebahagiaan umi dan adiknya lebih utama baginya sekarang.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara menawarkan baju melayu yang dibelinya untuk Nazril dulu. Tanpa mengendahkan perasaan Maisara, Nazril terus menyarung baju melayu warna coklat pemberiaan Nurul Huda dan mengatakan dia tidak menyukai baju melayu warna biru. Mendengarkan itu, perasaan Maisarah pedih dan dia menangis.

programme.desc: Emi, Zikri and Dhiya are good friends. But their fate changed when Erni asked Dhiya to marry her husband. Their friendship and affections turn into extreme jealousy that will involve the lives of loved ones.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Setelah lama bercinta, Zariman akhirnya melamar Arissa untuk menjadi isterinya dan mula membuat perancangan perkahwinan. Rafael dilanda kemelut rumahtangga apabila dia syak Diana curang dengan dia.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa

programme.desc: Ella returns from London, to spend her summer vacation back home, as Ella's mother forces her to celebrate the mother’s 20th wedding anniversary with her stepfather. She meets Andy who practically ignores her all the time, at the ceremony. Andy, an ex- gangster of Chow Kit, intends to turn over a new leaf as he feels responsible for his mother being paralysed. Andy's arrogance caught Ella's attention and this makes her love Andy even more after finding out his past story.

programme.title: Against the Odds - S01:E25 - Robin Van Persie, Pelé
programme.desc: Robin Van Persie’s career made him a hero to many; but he can’t compete with the love and adoration commanded by Brazil’s Pelé - This is Against The Odds.

programme.title: Against the Odds - S01:E24 - Nadia Comaneci, Jessica Ennis-Hill
programme.desc: This week on Against The Odds . . . the perfect gymnast. Nadia Comaneci was the first to score a perfect ten in the Montreal Olympic Games. But her life in Romania away from the spotlight was far from perfect. Until she found her escape. Plus the face of the London Olympics, Jessica Ennis-Hill.

programme.title: Against the Odds - S01:E17 - Martina Navratilova, Novak Djokovic, Rod Laver
programme.desc: On this episode of Against the Odds, we salute the superstars of tennis, celebrating the off court bravery of Martina Navratilova, the relentless winning of Novak Djokovic, and the all round greatness of the man who ushered in the modern professional era, Rod Laver.

programme.title: Against the Odds - S01:E35 - Amanda Nunes, Conor McGregor
programme.desc: Amanda Nunes beat every single women’s champion in her divisions’ history to become the greatest female fighter ever. Conor McGregor took over the world’s biggest fight promotion in only a few brief years before crossing over to boxing to face the greatest boxer of all time in the biggest fight in history.

programme.title: Against the Odds - S01:E29 - Magic Johnson, Becky Hammon, Yao Ming
programme.desc: Magic Johnson proved to everyone that HIV wasn’t a death sentence by flourishing in his post-playing career. Becky Hammon was told the most she could hope for was a college scholarship, so she became the first female coach in the NBA, and Yao Ming silenced his critics by becoming the most popular NBA player in the world.

programme.title: E1 Highlights - S02:E01 - Aoki Racing triumphiert mit Dani Clos und Mashael Alobaidan
programme.desc: Dani Clos and Mashael Alobaidan led Aoki Racing to win both group-stage races. Even after losing the first final, they managed to grab the overall win, with Steve Aoki celebrating right by the track.

programme.title: Sail GP Highlights - S02:E08 - SailGP Ostseeveranstaltung
programme.desc: For the second straight event, SailGP heads to a fresh spot, giving local enthusiasts a chance to witness the world’s top sailors in action. The scenic German seaside resort sets the stage as 12 teams from around the globe fight for dominance on the Baltic Sea.

programme.title: Racing on the Edge - S02:E08 - Fletchers Reise in SailGP
programme.desc: From competing at the sidelines of the 49er World Championships to working behind the scenes in hospitality, Fletcher’s journey is a story of resilience and humility. He fights to reclaim his position at the top of the SailGP circuit and re-emerges as driver of Emirates GBR.

programme.title: E1 - S02:E05 - Podiumsrennen Ergebnisse
programme.desc: Podium race – Aoki Racing wins, with Team Brady and Team AlUla battling for spots too.

programme.title: E1 Champions of the Water - S02:E03 - E1 Serie Episode 3: Dubrovnik Showdown
programme.desc: Get ready for an electrifying experience as the E1 Series heads back to the stunning Adriatic city of Dubrovnik. In Episode 3, dive into the thrilling action of electric hydrofoil RaceBirds, where sharp strategies and stunning landscapes come together for an unforgettable showdown.

programme.desc: Get ready for more heart-racing action as the UIM E1 World Championship took over Dubrovnik's Adriatic Sea on June 13–14, 2025. With the historic city walls and beautiful sights of the UNESCO Old Town, the famous RaceBird boats zoomed at 50 knots, making it an unforgettable event
